translation.en: Good morning, Jake Paulers! [chuckles]
translation.zh: 早上好 杰克·保罗家人们

translation.en: Wow, we have come a long way.
translation.zh: 哇 我们已经走过了很长的路

translation.en: It's still every day, bro.
translation.zh: 依旧《每天如此 兄弟》

translation.en: But today is the biggest day of my life.
translation.zh: 但今天是我人生中最重要的一天

translation.en: Today is the biggest moment of my life, and I'm putting it all on the line
translation.zh: 今天是我一生中最重要的时刻 今晚我将孤注一掷 在这个拳台上

translation.en: against one of the greatest combat strikers
translation.zh: 今晚我将孤注一掷 在这个拳台上

translation.en: right here in this ring tonight.
translation.zh: 与最伟大的拳手之一较量

translation.en: See you soon.
translation.zh: 待会儿见

translation.en: [man] Fire.
translation.zh: 棒极了

translation.en: -Pow! -[man] One-take Jake.
translation.zh: 一条就过的杰克

translation.en: If you're new, my name's Jake Paul. Welcome back to the channel.
translation.zh: 我叫杰克·保罗 欢迎回到我的频道

translation.en: [man 1] Brian. Brian. Brian!
translation.zh: 布莱恩

translation.en: -Let's get it, baby. Lock and load. -[man 2] You made him cry.
translation.zh: 我们开始吧 宝贝 做好准备

translation.en: [man 3] It's our motherfucking show. It's our house. Let's go.
translation.zh: 开始了 混蛋们 哟！这里是我们的家！我们走

translation.en: -[man 4] In for a real fight. -[man 5] He's shitting his pants.
translation.zh: 他都吓尿了

translation.en: -[man 4] You're fucking ready. -[man 3] We ain't going nowhere.
translation.zh: -你他妈准备好了-我们哪儿也不去

translation.en: -[man 1] Crazy. -[urine dribbling]
translation.zh: 疯了

translation.en: -[man 1] You all right? -[softly] Yeah, I'm good.
translation.zh: -你没事吧？-嗯 我很好

translation.en: -[Jake groans] -[man 1] You sure?
translation.zh: -你确定？-我很好

translation.en: -[man 1 sniggering] -Oh Jesus Christ.
translation.zh: 哦 天啊

translation.en: -[man 1 laughs] -[man 2] It was trouble, man.
translation.zh: 真是麻烦 兄弟

translation.en: You've always been my little brother.
translation.zh: 你一直都是我的弟弟

translation.en: Doesn't feel like that anymore.
translation.zh: 不再有那种感觉了

translation.en: Not only are you not so little now,
translation.zh: 你现在不仅不再那么小了

translation.en: but you've expanded your mind, your circle, your emotional intelligence,
translation.zh: 而且你已经扩展了你的思想你的圈子、你的情商

translation.en: and, somehow, your capabilities.
translation.zh: 以及你的能力

translation.en: From making silly home videos before YouTube even existed
translation.zh: 从油管出现之前就开始制作愚蠢的家庭自制视频

translation.en: to changing the entire landscape of combat sports,
translation.zh: 到改变整个格斗运动的格局

translation.en: everyone in this room knows just how powerful of a being you are.
translation.zh: 这个房间里的每个人都知道你是多么强大

translation.en: It's why we're all here, including Netflix.
translation.zh: 这就是我们在这里的原因包括Netflix

translation.en: You make it incredibly easy to be a proud brother.
translation.zh: 你让我很容易成为一个骄傲的哥哥

translation.en: And one day, if I run for president,
translation.zh: 如果我有一天竞选总统

translation.en: I'd be honored to have you as my vice president…
translation.zh: 我会很荣幸你能做我的副总统

translation.en: -[Jake chuckles] -…or maybe secretary of defense.
translation.zh: 或者是国防部长

translation.en: You'll be in charge of the red button, the all-powerful nuke
translation.zh: 你将负责按下全能核弹的红色按钮

translation.en: that also happens to be at the end of your right hand.
translation.zh: 你右手末端的拳头也像核弹一样全能

translation.en: While this moment is so much bigger than we can imagine,
translation.zh: 虽然这一刻比我们想象得要重要得多

translation.en: I promise tonight will be just another blip on your radar of life.
translation.zh: 我保证今晚只会是你人生雷达上的一个小亮点

translation.en: You've done all the hard work, bro. Go do what you do best.
translation.zh: 辛苦的工作你都已经做完了 兄弟去做你最擅长的事

translation.en: -Let's fucking go. -[brother] Let's fucking go, baby! -Let's go. -[applause]
translation.zh: -我们走吧 我们走-我们走吧 宝贝！

translation.en: -[Jake] Love you, bruh. -[brother] I love you, bro.
translation.zh: -爱你 兄弟-我爱你 兄弟

translation.en: -[man] Love you, man. So proud of you. -[Jake] Let's go.
translation.zh: 爱你 兄弟 真为你骄傲

translation.en: -[man] You're killing it, dude. -[all chanting] Who ray?
translation.zh: -我们走吧-你会秒杀全场的 兄弟 谁欢呼？

translation.en: We ray!
translation.zh: 我们欢呼！

translation.en: Tick! Tick! Tick!
translation.zh: 滴答滴答

translation.en: Boom! Let's go!
translation.zh: -砰！-我们走！

translation.en: [commentator] And now, making his way to the ring,
translation.zh: 他在走向拳击擂台的路上

translation.en: here is the popular social media sensation turned boxer,
translation.zh: 社交媒体上红极一时的拳击手来了

translation.en: the Problem Child… [dramatically] …Jake Paul!
translation.zh: 问题儿童 杰克·保罗！

translation.en: [man] Jake is gonna get knocked the fuck out tonight.
translation.zh: -杰克会被打晕的-打倒杰克·保罗！

translation.en: You ain't shit.
translation.zh: 你什么都不是

translation.en: [crowd chanting] Fuck Jake Paul! Fuck Jake Paul!
translation.zh: 打倒杰克·保罗！

translation.en: Jake Paul is a fucking idiot.
translation.zh: -杰克·保罗是个该死的白痴-打倒杰克·保罗！

translation.en: You fucking bitch. I will fucking kick your ass.
translation.zh: 你个该死的贱人 我要他妈的揍扁你

translation.en: He's just an absolute bellend.
translation.zh: -打倒杰克·保罗！-他就是个十足的混蛋

translation.en: -Obnoxious, arrogant asshole. -I can't stand this man.
translation.zh: -讨厌、傲慢的混蛋-我忍受不了这个人

translation.en: [crowd] Fuck Jake Paul!
translation.zh: 打倒杰克·保罗！

translation.en: Jake Paul, the most hated YouTuber on the planet.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗全世界最被人讨厌的油管网红

translation.en: -[chanting stops] -[man] It's nearly that time, Jake.
translation.zh: 时间快到了 杰克

translation.en: I'm gonna do a countdown of ten, and then you're gonna see it,
translation.zh: 我要倒数十个数 然后你就会看到

translation.en: you're gonna feel it, you're gonna celebrate it.
translation.zh: 你会感受到 你会庆祝

translation.en: -In ten. -[Jake exhales]
translation.zh: 十

translation.en: [man] Nine.
translation.zh: 九

translation.en: Eight.
translation.zh: 八

translation.en: Seven.
translation.zh: 七

translation.en: Six.
translation.zh: 六

translation.en: [echoing] Five. Four.
translation.zh: 五、四

translation.en: Three. Two. One.
translation.zh: 三、二、一

translation.en: I gotta tuck my balls away. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我要把蛋藏起来

translation.en: Is this gonna be the style where you show the slate closing
translation.zh: 这会不会是你们的风格你们展示打板之后

translation.en: and then, like, the person's reactions after it?
translation.zh: 看人的反应如何？

translation.en: -It's good when you see people, like… -[man] Yeah, exactly.
translation.zh: -你看人们这样很好 就这样…-对 没错

translation.en: Jake Paul is a promoter.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗是个筹办人

translation.en: Y'all got fooled into thinking he's a boxer.
translation.zh: 你们都被骗了 以为他是个拳击手

translation.en: I'm Jake Paul.
translation.zh: 我是杰克·保罗

translation.en: I used to be a landscaper,
translation.zh: 我以前是个园林设计师

translation.en: and now I'm a seashell collector and professional boxer,
translation.zh: 现在我是一个贝壳收藏家也是职业拳击手

translation.en: knocking people the fuck out.
translation.zh: 把人打晕

translation.en: -[music ends abruptly] -[gasps] Ow, my leg.
translation.zh: 哦 我的腿

translation.en: [man] Do you need a Prime?
translation.zh: 你需要一瓶运动饮料吗？

translation.en: I just had one, man. Tell Logan that shit doesn't work.
translation.zh: 我刚喝了一瓶普莱姆 兄弟 告诉洛根那破东西没用

translation.en: [Logan] We're fucking media whores who-- who make content on phones,
translation.zh: 我们就是他妈的媒体妓女在手机上制作内容

translation.en: edit on iMovie, post 'em to the Internet, and get people talking.
translation.zh: 用软件剪辑发布到互联网上 让人们谈论

translation.en: [commentator] Jake Paul is a totally different thing for boxing.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗在拳击界是完全不同的

translation.en: He's half boxer, half entertainer, YouTuber.
translation.zh: 他一半是拳击手一半是艺人 油管网红

translation.en: [Logan] Jake has built this hype train on "I'm fuckin' next up."
translation.zh: 杰克用"我他妈是下一个"来做宣传 让观众期待

translation.en: Potentially the best boxer of this generation.
translation.zh: 可能是这一代最好的拳击手

translation.en: I'm 24. I could take over the world. I could become the next Muhammad Ali.
translation.zh: 我今年24岁 我可以接手我可以成为下一个穆罕默德·阿里

translation.en: What the fuck you talkin' about? You're not fucking Muhammad Ali.
translation.zh: 你他妈在说什么？你才不是穆罕默德·阿里

translation.en: What are you gonna do when Jake Paul knocks you the fuck out, you fucking pussy?
translation.zh: 如果杰克·保罗把你打晕了你打算怎么办 胆小鬼？

translation.en: Many have accused Jake Paul
translation.zh: 许多人指责杰克·保罗

translation.en: of "being a clown whose boxing turn is just another stunt."
translation.zh: “是一个小丑他的拳击动作只是另一种噱头”

translation.en: I think people love to talk shit about my boxing ability.
translation.zh: 我觉得大家都喜欢贬低我的拳击能力

translation.en: Jake Paul isn't a boxer. This guy's a fucking YouTube kid.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗才不是拳击手这人就是个油管小屁孩

translation.en: I don't believe you'll ever get close to being a world-class fighter.
translation.zh: 我不相信你能接近成为世界级的拳手

translation.en: I believe that I will beat anybody on your roster.
translation.zh: 我相信我会打败你们名单上的任何人

translation.en: [Logan] Of course, he's delusional.
translation.zh: 他当然是在妄想

translation.en: You know, like, we all are. It's why we are where we are.
translation.zh: 我们都是 这就是我们在这里的原因

translation.en: Until it becomes a reality.
translation.zh: 直到它成为现实

translation.en: So, yeah, he's delusional, but that's the beauty of Jake Paul.
translation.zh: 所以 是的 他有妄想症但这正是杰克·保罗的魅力所在

translation.en: [commentator dramatically] The Problem Child is in the building!
translation.zh: 问题儿童来了！

translation.en: [man] What? A YouTuber fighting?
translation.zh: 什么？油管网红拳击？

translation.en: All right, this is ridiculous.
translation.zh: 好吧 这太荒谬了

translation.en: The biggest question was, "Is this just, like, a gimmick?"
translation.zh: 最大的问题是 这只是个噱头吗？

translation.en: [man] I'm sure a lot of boxing purists right now are like,
translation.zh: 我相信现在很多拳击纯粹主义者会说

translation.en: "Oh, you're having Jake Paul on."
translation.zh: “哦 你们邀请杰克·保罗上节目”

translation.en: "You're lending legitimacy to what's going on."
translation.zh: “你们是在为正在发生的事赋予合法性”

translation.en: The old guard boxing community had been very reluctant to warm up.
translation.zh: 老顽固的拳击群体一直很不愿意热身

translation.en: Social media has confused the whole world.
translation.zh: 社交媒体混淆了整个世界

translation.en: People think, "Oh, he must be able to do it
translation.zh: 人们认为：“他一定能做到

translation.en: 'cause millions of people think he can."
translation.zh: 因为数百万人认为他可以”

translation.en: I'm a real dog. I just became the biggest prizefighter overnight.
translation.zh: 我是真男人我一夜之间就成了最厉害的职业拳手

translation.en: -Jake Paul! -[all chanting]
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗！

translation.en: -[Jake] Jake Paul! -[all chanting]
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗！

translation.en: But boxing can be very dangerous.
translation.zh: 但拳击会非常危险

translation.en: Very dangerous.
translation.zh: 非常危险

translation.en: Jake Paul is that good of a promoter,
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗就是这么厉害的筹办人

translation.en: he's twisted people's ears, turned people's heads,
translation.zh: 他扭曲了人们的视听扭转了人们的思想

translation.en: and some people actually believe he can be a professional boxer.
translation.zh: 有些人甚至真的相信他能打败职业拳击手

translation.en: Will you finally accept that you're a celebrity boxer
translation.zh: 你最终会接受你是一个名人拳击手

translation.en: and not a real boxer?
translation.zh: 而不是一个真正的拳击手吗？

translation.en: Next question, brother.
translation.zh: 下一个问题 兄弟

translation.en: He can go back and be king of the jungle in YouTube,
translation.zh: 他可以回去成为油管的丛林之王

translation.en: but can he actually be a professional boxer? No.
translation.zh: 但他真的能打败职业拳击手吗？ 不能

translation.en: YouTube?!
translation.zh: 油管？

translation.en: [overacting] Is… Is that you?
translation.zh: 那是你吗？

translation.en: Oh my God! -[whimsical music playing] -It's been so long.
translation.zh: 我的天啊 太久没见了

translation.en: But, uh, we got good news, guys. We're coming back.
translation.zh: 但我们有好消息 各位 我们回来了

translation.en: Jake, what do you think of that?
translation.zh: 杰克 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: Man! The hype is real, man!
translation.zh: 天啊 宣传是真的 兄弟

translation.en: We are two kids from Ohio, make no mistake, who grew up in a tree.
translation.zh: 我们是两个来自俄亥俄州的孩子毫无疑问 我们在一棵树上长大

translation.en: [Jake] From the earliest days I can remember, it's us, you know, playing in the woods together,
translation.zh: 从我记事起我们就一起在树林里玩耍

translation.en: making forts, building fires.
translation.zh: 筑堡垒、生火

translation.en: We were just always there for each other.
translation.zh: 我们总是在彼此身边

translation.en: They go to the same places.
translation.zh: 他们去同样的地方

translation.en: They get there very different ways.
translation.zh: 他们到达那里的方式非常不同

translation.en: [Logan] I operate with logic and rationality. Jake operates with emotion.
translation.zh: 我做事有逻辑和理性杰克很感情用事

translation.en: We're yin and yang. We are the exact same and the exact fucking opposite.
translation.zh: 我们是阴和阳我们完全一样却又完全相反

translation.en: [Stepnick] They both were interested in wrestling and football.
translation.zh: 他们都对摔跤和足球感兴趣

translation.en: [Jake] That was my identity. Sports and athleticism and competitiveness.
translation.zh: 那是我的身份体育、运动能力和竞争力

translation.en: We were a team, and our parents were really strict.
translation.zh: 我们本是一个团队我们的父母对我们很严格

translation.en: Mainly my dad. And it was always Logan and I against him.
translation.zh: 主要是我爸爸 总是洛根和我对抗他

translation.en: Holy shit. Yo, Greg Paul is a fuckin' being.
translation.zh: 天啊 格雷格·保罗是个讨厌的人

translation.en: -[bright music playing] -[Logan] He's a menace.
translation.zh: 他是个威胁

translation.en: Man, that guy's intense.
translation.zh: 天啊 那人脾气真大

translation.en: People would be like, "You're so strict with your kids."
translation.zh: 很多人会说：“你对孩子们太严格了”

translation.en: "Okay, give me your kid for two weeks,
translation.zh: “好吧 把你的孩子交给我两周

translation.en: and when your kid comes back, they'll be a better kid."
translation.zh: 当你的孩子回去的时候他们会成为更好的孩子”

translation.en: He always said, "Life's not easy. Life's not fair."
translation.zh: 他总是说：“生活并不容易人生是不公平的”

translation.en: "No one will pick you up when you're down."
translation.zh: “如果你跌倒 没人会扶你起来”

translation.en: -Welcome to life. Get the fuck over it. -Jake may throw around the word "abusive."
translation.zh: 欢迎来到人生 适应就好了 杰克可能会说“虐待”这个词

translation.en: I prefer "not quite legal."
translation.zh: 我更喜欢说“不太合法”

translation.en: Yeah, my-- my dad would slap the shit out of me.
translation.zh: 是啊 我爸会打得我屁滚尿流的

translation.en: I don't resent it.
translation.zh: 我并不怨恨

translation.en: I'm understanding of why he did that. That's all he knew.
translation.zh: 我能理解他为什么这么做他只知道这些

translation.en: I never laid hands on my kids.
translation.zh: 我从没碰过我的孩子

translation.en: I said, "Jake, I did pick you up and throw you on a couch a couple times."
translation.zh: 我说：“杰克 我确实有几次把你抱起来扔到沙发上”

translation.en: "But I was afraid of you."
translation.zh: “但我很怕你”

translation.en: "That's what the fuck dads are supposed to do."
translation.zh: “这是爸爸应该做的”

translation.en: If somebody comes in here, starts harassing everybody
translation.zh: 如果有人进来 开始骚扰每个人

translation.en: and smacking around an old lady,
translation.zh: 对一个老太太拳打脚踢

translation.en: do you want a couple Greg Pauls in the room?
translation.zh: 你希望房间里有几个格雷格·保罗吗？

translation.en: Or do you want some fuckin' fairy f***, whiny-ass little bitch
translation.zh: 还是你想找个娘娘腔的爱发牢骚的小婊子

translation.en: who's gonna sit there and talk about emotions?
translation.zh: 坐在那里跟你谈情绪？

translation.en: Who do you want in the room?
translation.zh: 你想让谁在房间里？

translation.en: Personally, I attribute pretty much all of my success to my father.
translation.zh: 就我个人而言 我几乎把我所有的成功都归功于我父亲

translation.en: He was so hard and so tough on us
translation.zh: 他对我们太苛刻了

translation.en: that my brother and I's imagination really started to flare up.
translation.zh: 以至于我和哥哥的想象力真的开始爆发了

translation.en: [Jake] So one day, we get a camera, and we just start filming our lives.
translation.zh: 所以有一天我们弄了台摄像机就开始拍摄我们的生活

translation.en: [Stepnick] Oh, good! Yeah, baby!
translation.zh: 很好！耶 宝贝！

translation.en: Jake, you need to do the dishes.
translation.zh: 杰克 你要去洗碗

translation.en: [lip-synching] Oh no, I can't do that. No, I'm not doing that.
translation.zh: 哦 不 我不能那样做 不要 我才不去

translation.en: This was the start of comedy skits online and viral videos.
translation.zh: 这是网上喜剧小品和疯传视频的开始

translation.en: [imitates Bane] I was born in the dark.
translation.zh: 我在黑暗中出生

translation.en: We start watching YouTube videos. We're bored. We're recreating them.
translation.zh: 我们开始看油管视频我们很无聊 我们重新创造它们

translation.en: We're directing. We're filming. We're creating comedy.
translation.zh: 我们执导、拍摄 我们创造喜剧

translation.en: The Sneeze.
translation.zh: 喷嚏

translation.en: [Jake] They would get, like, a thousand views, which was a lot.
translation.zh: 那些视频会有1000的播放量这很多了 你知道吗？

translation.en: You know, there's a thousand people in your high school.
translation.zh: 你们高中才有1000人

translation.en: [Jake] We were just becoming popular.
translation.zh: 我们就变得火起来了

translation.en: What are you doing? You can't cut down the--
translation.zh: 喂 你在干什么…

translation.en: [Jake laughing] Lean forward more. You actually care about the forest.
translation.zh: 停 身体再前倾 你真的关心森林吗？

translation.en: [Jake present] Logan was definitely leading everything.
translation.zh: 洛根绝对领导着一切

translation.en: He was, like, the captain of the two-man team
translation.zh: 他就像两人队的队长

translation.en: and had the final say.
translation.zh: 有最后的决定权

translation.en: You know, I wanted to be like him and make him proud, I guess.
translation.zh: 我想成为他那样的人 让他为我骄傲

translation.en: I wanted him to be like, "I have a cool little brother."
translation.zh: 我想让他说：“我有个很酷的弟弟”

translation.en: -Logan! -[whimsical music playing]
translation.zh: 洛根！

translation.en: [Jake] Come on! Stay with us.
translation.zh: 来吧！和我们待在一起

translation.en: Logan, it's Christmastime. It's Christmas!
translation.zh: 洛根 现在是圣诞季洛根 今天是圣诞节！

translation.en: [present] At first, it was just for fun.
translation.zh: 一开始只是为了好玩

translation.en: Okay, we need to go harder, we need to start putting money into these videos.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们要加大力度开始往这些视频里面投钱

translation.en: We need to start getting props. We need to get actors.
translation.zh: 我们需要开始找道具 我们需要演员

translation.en: We need to build it up and create the best videos on Vine possible.
translation.zh: 我们需要积累人气 并在视频分享网站创造出最好的视频

translation.en: That was our goal.
translation.zh: 那是我们的目标

translation.en: It's just one muffin. Why not?
translation.zh: 只是一个麦芬蛋糕 何妨呢？

translation.en: Guess it's time to go workout now.
translation.zh: 我想现在是时候去健身了

translation.en: I was used to landscaping for ten dollars an hour,
translation.zh: 我曾经做过十美元一小时的园林美化工作

translation.en: and I remember the first brand deal I did.
translation.zh: 我还记得我拿到的第一个品牌合同

translation.en: I got paid $200, and I was like, "Oh my gosh, I'm rich."
translation.zh: 我拿到了200美元我想：“天啊 我发财了”

translation.en: They're like, "We have another brand deal. That one did well. How much do you want?"
translation.zh: 他们会说:“我们还有一个品牌合同那个做得超级好 你要多少钱？”

translation.en: Me and my dad were on the phone like…
translation.zh: 我和我爸在打电话

translation.en: [whispering] "How much do you want?" "I don't know. Like… 5,000."
translation.zh: 说：“你想要多少？我不知道 就说五千吧”

translation.en: They were like, "Okay, we could do that." And we were like, "What the fuck?!"
translation.zh: 他们说：“好 我们能做到”我们说：“什么情况？”

translation.en: "Five thousand dollars! Like, Jesus Christ!"
translation.zh: “五千美元！”天啊！

translation.en: Cash. Money.
translation.zh: 现金

translation.en: [Jake] Okay, if we have 200,000 followers, and we're making $5,000 a post,
translation.zh: 好吧 如果我们有20万粉丝每个帖子赚5000美元

translation.en: what happens when we get to a million? Or two million?
translation.zh: 当我们达到100万或200万粉丝的时候 会发生什么？

translation.en: I remember when they made the word "influencer."
translation.zh: 我记得他们创造了“网红”这个词

translation.en: That was us. They were talking about us.
translation.zh: 那就是我们 他们在谈论我们

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 我们走！

translation.en: Dropped out of high school. Moved to Los Angeles with my brother,
translation.zh: 高中就辍学了 和我哥哥一起搬去了洛杉矶他就在那个房间里

translation.en: who's in that room right there.
translation.zh: 和我哥哥一起搬去了洛杉矶他就在那个房间里

translation.en: And we just started chasing our dreams.
translation.zh: 我们就开始追逐我们的梦想

translation.en: Yo!
translation.zh: 哟！

translation.en: Good morning, Jake Paulers. What's poppin'?
translation.zh: 早上好 杰克·保罗家人们过得好吗？

translation.en: If you're new here, I'm Jake Paul. You guys are the Jake Paulers.
translation.zh: 如果你是新来的 我叫杰克·保罗你们是杰克·保罗家人们

translation.en: [present] So we move to LA, start auditioning for roles,
translation.zh: 于是我们搬到洛杉矶开始为各个角色试镜

translation.en: start collabing with some of the other biggest YouTubers in the world.
translation.zh: 开始与世界上其他一些粉丝最多的油管网红合作

translation.en: And we all lived in the same apartment complex.
translation.zh: 我们都住在同一个公寓小区里

translation.en: All of us were going viral two, three times a day.
translation.zh: 我们所有人每天都有两、三次视频被疯传

translation.en: The regular world starts to pay attention. Traditional media starts to cover us.
translation.zh: 普通世界开始关注传统媒体开始报道我们

translation.en: -[man] What's up? How you doin'? -Good. How are you?
translation.zh: -我的兄弟 你好吗？-很好 你呢？

translation.en: -[man] Good to see you. -You guys got bright lights out here.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你-你们这里的灯光很亮

translation.en: [man] Listen. So you're making some history right now.
translation.zh: 听着 兄弟 所以你现在正在创造历史

translation.en: You're making some noise.
translation.zh: 你在制造声音

translation.en: [Logan] I think the way Greg raised us,
translation.zh: 我觉得格雷格养育我们的方式

translation.en: combined with Jake living in my shadow for as long as he did,
translation.zh: 再加上杰克出生以来一直活在我的阴影下

translation.en: put a fire in his belly that is so hard to put out.
translation.zh: 在他肚子里放了一把难以扑灭的火

translation.en: And then, boom, I get the call to go audition for Disney Channel.
translation.zh: 然后突然我接到了迪士尼频道的试镜电话

translation.en: Do you think I'm gonna get the role? Do you think I'm gonna get it?
translation.zh: 你们觉得我会得到这个角色吗？你们觉得我会得到吗？

translation.en: ♪ Hey! Let's go make some videos, hey! ♪
translation.zh: 喂！我们去拍点视频 喂！

translation.en: ♪ You could watch Dirk doing crazy dares ♪
translation.zh: 你可以看德克进行疯狂的冒险

translation.en: -♪ Saying, "Here we go" ♪ -Here we go!
translation.zh: -说：“我们走”-我们走！

translation.en: ♪ He'll do anything you want Just don't try this at home ♪
translation.zh: 你想让他做什么他都会做但是别在家里这么做

translation.en: [chuckling] He got the role.
translation.zh: 他得到了这个角色

translation.en: Dirk? I… I'm such a big fan.
translation.zh: 德克？我是你的粉丝

translation.en: Sweet.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: Two Vine kids from Ohio… [dopey voice] …just moved to LA to see what we could do in media…
translation.zh: 两个俄亥俄州做视频的孩子 刚搬到洛杉矶 想看看能在媒体界做些什么

translation.en: [regular voice] …got a starring role in a major Disney show.
translation.zh: 在迪士尼的一部大剧中拿到了主角

translation.en: [Jake] And so it really blew me up,
translation.zh: 这真的让我更红了

translation.en: took me to another level, and legitimized my whole purpose.
translation.zh: 把我带到了另一个层次让我做的事情整个有了意义

translation.en: I-- It gave credibility to what it was that I was trying to do.
translation.zh: 让我努力做的事情有了回报

translation.en: [footage] Three years ago, I was a-- a class clown,
translation.zh: 三年前 我是班里的小丑

translation.en: getting laughed at by teachers and classmates.
translation.zh: 被老师和同学嘲笑

translation.en: All it is is hard work and passion.
translation.zh: 一切都是努力工作和激情

translation.en: Yo, guys.
translation.zh: 哟 各位

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你们

translation.en: You guys are amazing. You changed my life.
translation.zh: 你们太棒了 你们改变了我的生活

translation.en: Here he is. The man, the social media and YouTube sensation.
translation.zh: 他来了 这个人是社交媒体、油管上的红人

translation.en: Fourteen million subscribers.
translation.zh: 1400万订阅者

translation.en: It's an honor and a responsibility.
translation.zh: 这是一种荣誉 也是一种责任

translation.en: He was going 100 miles an hour. More tail than you can shake a stick at.
translation.zh: 他以每小时160公里的速度行驶女人多到数不清

translation.en: Girls just throwing their panties at him. Making a lot of money, spending a lot.
translation.zh: 女孩们把内裤扔向他 他赚了很多钱 花钱如流水

translation.en: I mean, he bought a $7.4 million house at 18 years old. That's crazy.
translation.zh: 他在18岁时买了一栋价值740万美元的房子 这太疯狂了

translation.en: Welcome home, Jake Paulers! [laughs]
translation.zh: 欢迎回家 杰克·保罗家人们！

translation.en: We made it, Mom!
translation.zh: 我们成功了 妈妈！

translation.en: [Logan] We have millions of dollars.
translation.zh: 我们有几百万美元

translation.en: Hundreds of millions of people paying attention to what we do.
translation.zh: 数以亿计的人正在关注我们做的事

translation.en: -Like, I see you popping up everywhere. -Yeah. Uh… Thank you.
translation.zh: 我到处都能看到你 对 谢谢

translation.en: -How many views do you have? -I don't know.
translation.zh: 有多少浏览？你有20亿

translation.en: You have 2 billion. I have 2.6 billion. We have some competition.
translation.zh: 我大概有26亿 是的 我们可以比一下

translation.en: [present] In Los Angeles, we were more focused on business
translation.zh: 在洛杉矶 我们更专注于业务

translation.en: and making money and growing our brands,
translation.zh: 赚钱和发展我们的品牌

translation.en: and that became a competitive race.
translation.zh: 这变成了一场竞赛

translation.en: What do you call your people?
translation.zh: 你怎么称呼你的粉丝？

translation.en: -YouTube.com/LoganPaulVlogs. -Nice.
translation.zh: -油管网站 洛根·保罗视频博客-不错

translation.en: I'm gonna be the biggest entertainer on the planet.
translation.zh: 我将成为这个星球上最大的艺人

translation.en: Cop yourself some of the hottest merch in the game.
translation.zh: 给自己弄点游戏中最热门的商品

translation.en: Check this out! I think this is my favorite one. [squawking]
translation.zh: 看看这个！这是我最喜欢的一个

translation.en: Get your merch here. Hottest merch in the game. Link in the description.
translation.zh: 把你的商品拿过来游戏中最热门的商品 链接在描述中

translation.en: -[Jake] He's wearing my merch. -[man] It's a rainbow!
translation.zh: -他穿着我的商品-是彩虹！

translation.en: [Jake] He's got a gap tooth.
translation.zh: 他有个牙缝

translation.en: [present] And I wanted to prove to him that I'm legit.
translation.zh: 我想向他证明我是有能力的

translation.en: I can do this too.
translation.zh: 我也可以做这个

translation.en: And he wanted to prove to me,
translation.zh: 他想向我证明

translation.en: "I'm the bigger brother. I'm gonna get more followers."
translation.zh: “我是哥哥 我会有更多的粉丝”

translation.en: Things got too competitive.
translation.zh: 竞争太激烈了

translation.en: There was a point where we hated each other.
translation.zh: 我们曾经一度互相憎恨

translation.en: -[man] Like, legitimately? -Legitimately.
translation.zh: -真心的吗？-真心的

translation.en: Not for clout, not for clicks.
translation.zh: 不是为了影响力 不是为了点击率

translation.en: This is so fucking stupid. [laughs]
translation.zh: 这真是太蠢了

translation.en: We had YouTube beef.
translation.zh: 我们在油管闹过不合

translation.en: Logan was really good at capitalizing and saying,
translation.zh: 但洛根很擅长利用这句话

translation.en: "I'm the big brother. You're in my shadow."
translation.zh: “我是哥哥 你活在我的阴影里”

translation.en: Logan, you're gonna wanna stop taunting me and pushing me
translation.zh: 洛根 你不要再嘲笑我、逼迫我

translation.en: and poking me and making things up.
translation.zh: 奚落我、编故事了

translation.en: -He's a loose cannon. -I'm a loose nuke!
translation.zh: -他是个不守规矩的人-我是一个松散的核弹

translation.en: He was my only competition on YouTube, and I was getting more views than him.
translation.zh: 他是我在油管上唯一的竞争对手我的点击量比他多

translation.en: I was beating him. Make no mistake.
translation.zh: 我战胜了他 别搞错了

translation.en: This is so fuckin' stupid, but I had more subs.
translation.zh: 这太蠢了 但我有更多关注量我有姑娘

translation.en: I had the girl. More people paying attention. Selling more merch.
translation.zh: 这太蠢了 但我有更多关注量我有姑娘 越来越多的人开始关注销售更多的商品

translation.en: And that's when I saw him really do some conniving things.
translation.zh: 就在那时 我看到他做了一些真正的纵容之事

translation.en: "I'm bigger than you. I'm better-looking than you."
translation.zh: 我比你厉害 我比你好看

translation.en: "More creative than you. I tell better stories."
translation.zh: 我更有创造力 我讲的故事更好

translation.en: I thought I was, like, just a better version of Jake.
translation.zh: 我以为我就是更好的杰克

translation.en: It was war, dog.
translation.zh: 那是战争 兄弟

translation.en: It was YouTube fuckin' war.
translation.zh: 这是油管之战

translation.en: ♪ Now you got a few subscribers And you think that you're the shit ♪
translation.zh: 现在你有了一些订阅你觉得你就是顶级

translation.en: ♪ I'll admit, you got money, you got bars You got chicks, but you're redic ♪
translation.zh: 我承认 你有钱、有说唱你有女人 但你很可笑

translation.en: ♪ Help me, help you Make a better song, bitch ♪
translation.zh: 帮帮我 帮帮你创作点好听点的歌吧 贱人

translation.en: ♪ Numbers don't lie The Logang is shit ♪
translation.zh: 数字不会说谎 洛根粉是狗屎

translation.en: It was just crazy competition. Hard as a mom.
translation.zh: 这是场疯狂竞争 母亲很艰难

translation.en: What mom would like two sons fighting against each other? No one!
translation.zh: 哪个妈妈会喜欢两个儿子吵架？没有

translation.en: Logan threw him under the bus, messed around with his ex.
translation.zh: 洛根背叛了他 和他前女友乱搞

translation.en: ♪ Uh-oh, that's Alissa Violet Used to be your chick ♪
translation.zh: 哦哦 那是艾丽莎·维奥莱特以前是你的女人

translation.en: ♪ Now she in the Logang And you know she on my… team ♪
translation.zh: 现在她是洛根粉你知道她站我…这边

translation.en: Logan definitely crossed the line. But I get it from his point of view.
translation.zh: 洛根绝对是越界了 但我理解他的想法

translation.en: I was 22 years old, and I didn't care, at the time,
translation.zh: 当时我22岁 我并不在乎

translation.en: how bad I was hurting my little brother.
translation.zh: 我对我弟弟的伤害有多深

translation.en: At the time, so much was going right,
translation.zh: 当时 一切都很顺利

translation.en: and it was easy to throw around these extreme emotions.
translation.zh: 这些极端的情绪很容易被抛在脑后

translation.en: Hate. Envy. Jealousy. Just so volatile.
translation.zh: 恨、忌妒、吃醋 太不稳定了

translation.en: Then things started going wrong. What goes up must come down.
translation.zh: 然后事情开始变糟爬得越高 摔得越狠

translation.en: For both of us.
translation.zh: 我们两个都是

translation.en: We were the two biggest people on YouTube.
translation.zh: 我们是油管上最有影响力的两个人

translation.en: But we both wanted to be the biggest.
translation.zh: 但我们都想成为最厉害的

translation.en: You gotta start doing crazy shit just to get views.
translation.zh: 你必须开始做些疯狂的事来吸引浏览量

translation.en: [anchor 1] Residents in a Hollywood neighborhood are angry.
translation.zh: 西好莱坞社区的居民非常愤怒

translation.en: They say they've had enough of the chaos created by a social media star
translation.zh: 他们说 他们已经受够了这位 以疯狂行为闻名的社交媒体明星所造成的混乱

translation.en: known for his crazy antics.
translation.zh: 以疯狂行为闻名的社交媒体明星所造成的混乱

translation.en: [anchor 2] A recent stunt involved tossing furniture into an empty pool
translation.zh: 最近的一个噱头是把家具扔进一个空游泳池

translation.en: and setting the pile on fire.
translation.zh: 然后堆在一起点着

translation.en: [woman] It used to be a nice quiet street. Now we're just this war zone.
translation.zh: 这曾经是一条非常安静的街道现在我们这里就是个战区

translation.en: -[man 1] Jake, Channel Five! -[man 2] Jake, I wouldn't do that.
translation.zh: 杰克 五频道！ 杰克 我不会那么做的

translation.en: [Logan] I wanna, um, take this time to talk about my brother, Jake Paul,
translation.zh: 我想借此机会谈谈我的弟弟杰克·保罗

translation.en: and his recent split with Disney Channel.
translation.zh: 以及他最近与迪士尼频道的分道扬镳

translation.en: [anchor 3] Family-friendly Disney has announced it is splitting with the 20-year-old star.
translation.zh: 适合家庭的迪士尼公司宣布与这位20岁的明星分道扬镳

translation.en: [Jake present] You're in LA. Now you have $10 million.
translation.zh: 你在洛杉矶 现在你有一千万美元

translation.en: You think you're cool. You have fame. You have all this pressure.
translation.zh: 你觉得自己很酷、你有名气你有各种压力

translation.en: Your ego's in the way. You're still figuring out who you are.
translation.zh: 你的自负影响着你你还在试图弄清楚自己是谁

translation.en: All of that's a recipe for disaster.
translation.zh: 所有这些都是灾难的根源

translation.en: [anchor 4] Logan Paul, the YouTube star, who has millions of young followers
translation.zh: 洛根·保罗是油管上的超级明星他在网上的滑稽视频

translation.en: with his zany videos online,
translation.zh: 拥有数百万年轻粉丝

translation.en: recently, as you know, came under fire for posting an alarming video
translation.zh: 最近 如你所知因为发布了一段引起警戒的视频

translation.en: showing the body of a person who took their own life.
translation.zh: 展示了一个自杀的人的尸体而受到了抨击

translation.en: Did we just find a dead person in the forest, hanging?
translation.zh: 我们刚刚是发现了一个上吊死的人吗？

translation.en: I've… [chuckles] …never been hated by the whole world.
translation.zh: 我从来没有被全世界痛恨

translation.en: [anchor 5] Jake Paul's Calabasas home has been raided by the FBI.
translation.zh: 杰克在卡拉巴萨斯的家 被联邦调查局搜查了

translation.en: [anchor 6] Two dozen feds could be seen carrying evidence from the property,
translation.zh: 二十多名联邦探员从房子里拿着证据出去

translation.en: including several firearms.
translation.zh: 包括几支枪

translation.en: [anchor 7] Paul was accused of sexual assault by TikTok star Justine Paradise.
translation.zh: 保罗被抖音明星贾斯汀·天堂指控性侵犯

translation.en: Correct me if I'm wrong, but nothing's come from it legally--
translation.zh: 如果我说错了请指正但这不是合法的

translation.en: Course not.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: [snorts softly] Of course not.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: [anchor 6] Jake Paul receives a big thumbs down from most of the civilized world.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗受到了大多数文明世界的强烈反对

translation.en: He is completely unhinged.
translation.zh: 他完全疯了

translation.en: Who the fuck is Jake Paul?
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗到底是谁？

translation.en: Today we are talking about the blockhead that is Jake Paul.
translation.zh: 今天我们要谈论的是杰克·保罗这个笨蛋

translation.en: It was easy to rip me apart. It became a thing to hate Jake Paul.
translation.zh: 要把我撕碎很容易恨杰克·保罗成了一件事

translation.en: [man] Jake Paul has gotta be the dumbest, cockiest, stupidest,
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗肯定是社交媒体圈里最笨

translation.en: most egotistical person in the social media sphere.
translation.zh: 最自大、最蠢、最自负的人

translation.en: The backlash and eyeballs and responsibility,
translation.zh: 反作用、关注和责任

translation.en: at 21, 22 years old,
translation.zh: 在21、22岁的时候

translation.en: that we had is just not real life.
translation.zh: 我们拥有的不是真实的生活

translation.en: Jake is the only person who can understand what that's like.
translation.zh: 杰克是唯一能理解那种感觉的人

translation.en: Logan's the only other person that has walked a mile in my shoes.
translation.zh: 洛根是唯一体会过我经历的人

translation.en: And in those moments of peril, Jake and I realized
translation.zh: 在那种危险的时刻 杰克和我意识到

translation.en: that we will always be there for each other, no matter what.
translation.zh: 无论发生什么我们都会一直在彼此身边

translation.en: Jake was so close to being nothing. Gone. Done.
translation.zh: 杰克差一点就什么都没了不见了、完蛋了

translation.en: Literally two months away from being flat broke.
translation.zh: 真的再过几个月就破产了

translation.en: It's not easy to be hated by the whole entire world.
translation.zh: 被全世界的人恨是不容易的

translation.en: It creates a very dark mental place.
translation.zh: 这创造了一个非常阴暗的精神空间

translation.en: I mean, both my dad and I felt worried for my brother's life.
translation.zh: 爸爸和我都为弟弟的性命担心

translation.en: Jake's always been pretty emotionally unpredictable
translation.zh: 杰克一向情绪很难预测

translation.en: and volatile.
translation.zh: 很容易变化

translation.en: There was a point where we were both legitimately concerned that Jake was gonna kill himself.
translation.zh: 我们都担心杰克可能会自杀我们的担心不无道理

translation.en: He needed purpose.
translation.zh: 他需要一个目标

translation.en: No one knew what he was gonna, like, do.
translation.zh: 没人知道他会做什么

translation.en: What is he… What's he good at?
translation.zh: 他… 他擅长什么？

translation.en: This will be no contest. This will be a total annihilation.
translation.zh: 这不会是一场比赛 这会是绝对的歼灭

translation.en: -[man] Any special training? -No special training.
translation.zh: 有特殊训练吗？ 没有特殊训练 只是去对战

translation.en: Just be at the fight.
translation.zh: 没有特殊训练 只是去对战

translation.en: I'm ready to back up everything I'm saying, and I'm through talking.
translation.zh: 我准备好支持我说的一切了我不想再说了

translation.en: [Helwani] Boxing is a very unique sport from a business standpoint.
translation.zh: 从商业角度来看拳击是一项非常独特的运动

translation.en: It's constructed unlike any other sports entity out there.
translation.zh: 它的结构跟其他现有的体育运动实体都不同

translation.en: No different than Barnum & Bailey
translation.zh: 跟马戏团到不同的城市进行马戏团演出没什么区别

translation.en: going town-to-town to put on circus acts, you have all these different promoters
translation.zh: 跟马戏团到不同的城市进行马戏团演出没什么区别 有各种不同的筹办人说：“把你的钱给我

translation.en: going, "Give me your money
translation.zh: 有各种不同的筹办人说：“把你的钱给我

translation.en: 'cause I've got a special event in this fight, in this drama,
translation.zh: 因为这场比赛这次对战有一个特殊活动

translation.en: that you only see once in your lifetime."
translation.zh: 一辈子难得一见”

translation.en: All I wanna do is to present to America and the world
translation.zh: 我想做的只有展示给美国和世界

translation.en: the best in boxing.
translation.zh: 拳击中最好的表现

translation.en: [commentator 1] Combinations! Oh, it's over!
translation.zh: 组合 哦 全都结束了

translation.en: [Helwani] Here's the thing, I can't tell you just how hard it is
translation.zh: 问题是这样的我没办法告诉你 让人们

translation.en: to get people to be emotionally invested, to get people to care,
translation.zh: 在情绪上投入 让人们在乎有多难

translation.en: to buy pay-per-views and tickets.
translation.zh: 付费看节目 花钱买票有多难

translation.en: [commentator 2] Boxing has kinda been on a down cycle over the last couple years
translation.zh: 拳击在过去几年 热度一直在降低

translation.en: because the UFC is beating it right now in popularity.
translation.zh: 因为终极格斗冠军赛在热度上打败了拳击

translation.en: The pay-per-view buys recently haven't been as big as in the past.
translation.zh: 付费看节目的观众没有以前多了

translation.en: [commentator 3] As of last night, tickets were still available,
translation.zh: 昨天晚上票还有剩余

translation.en: and pay-per-view numbers are way down.
translation.zh: 付费看节目的观众数量大幅下降

translation.en: And so this started to become a thing.
translation.zh: 所以这现在变成了一个显著现象

translation.en: "Boxing is irrelevant. Boxing hasn't been relevant for a decade."
translation.zh: “拳击不重要拳击已经十年都不重要了”

translation.en: Boxing is losing their fans. It's in danger of becoming irrelevant.
translation.zh: 拳击失去了粉丝群体有变成不重要的危机

translation.en: "Boxing is dead."
translation.zh: “拳击已经死了”

translation.en: The sport of boxing's dead.
translation.zh: 拳击运动已经死了

translation.en: [man] Boxing is dead.
translation.zh: 拳击已经死了

translation.en: HBO Sports simply dumping boxing after 40-plus years.
translation.zh: HBO体育频道在40多年后直接放弃拳击

translation.en: [Helwani] But boxing was not dead.
translation.zh: 但拳击没有死

translation.en: Boxing will never be dead, and it certainly isn't dead now.
translation.zh: 拳击永远不会死 现在也绝对没有死

translation.en: [man] Okay, I think this is something that everybody will wanna understand.
translation.zh: 我想这是每个人都会想弄明白的

translation.en: Why boxing?
translation.zh: 为什么是拳击？

translation.en: These YouTuber brothers from the UK calling out me and Logan to fight.
translation.zh: 一对来自英国的油管兄弟喊我和洛根对战

translation.en: Jake Paul. Logan Paul. Any of the Pauls. I don't care. Bring it.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗 洛根·保罗保罗家谁来都行 我不在乎 放马过来

translation.en: There's a trifecta that fuels Jake and I both.
translation.zh: 有一个三重彩让杰克和我都很有斗志

translation.en: When you combine media with passion and business, money, we're in.
translation.zh: 当你把媒体和激情生意、钱结合在一起 我们就加入

translation.en: [Jake] Ten days later, there's signed contracts,
translation.zh: 十天之后签了合同

translation.en: and then on the 11th day, it was, "Let's become professional boxers."
translation.zh: 然后第11天就变成“我们做职业拳击手吧”

translation.en: What I learned in the entertainment industry
translation.zh: 我在娱乐行业学到的

translation.en: directly correlates to boxing because boxing is the show business.
translation.zh: 跟拳击直接相关因为拳击就是娱乐界

translation.en: First and foremost, it's a show.
translation.zh: 但首先最重要得的 它是一种表演

translation.en: A boxing promoter puts together an attraction.
translation.zh: 一个拳击筹办人打造了一个吸引人的东西

translation.en: Then you construct a business deal around that attraction
translation.zh: 然后你们围绕这个吸引人的东西打造了一门生意

translation.en: so that you can make money for the people participating
translation.zh: 这样就可以让参与的人赚钱

translation.en: and make some for yourself.
translation.zh: 你们自己也可以赚一点

translation.en: [Helwani] There have been some unique cases
translation.zh: 现在有一些独特的案例

translation.en: where the great boxer with the great personality
translation.zh: 有了名气的伟大的拳击手

translation.en: says, "You know what? I could cut out the promoter."
translation.zh: 说“你知道吗？我可以直接不用筹办人了”

translation.en: "A, I'll get more money, and b, I got the gift of the gab."
translation.zh: 第一 我会拿到更多的钱第二 我可以更有话语权

translation.en: "I got the personality. I could be my own promoter."
translation.zh: 我有了名气 我可以做自己的筹办人

translation.en: That's essentially what Jake Paul has done.
translation.zh: 这基本就是杰克·保罗的做法

translation.en: What's up. It's the Paul bros.
translation.zh: 大家好 是保罗兄弟

translation.en: The pay-per-view for the official fight
translation.zh: 官方比赛的付费观看

translation.en: is now available for purchase on this channel.
translation.zh: 现在可以在本频道购买了

translation.en: Let's go, baby.
translation.zh: 我们走吧 宝贝

translation.en: In the world of YouTube,
translation.zh: 在油管的世界

translation.en: when I was the villain, a lot of my videos would get demonetized.
translation.zh: 当我是坏人我的很多视频都会被取消货币化

translation.en: Sponsors didn't really wanna mess with me
translation.zh: 赞助商不想跟我扯上关系

translation.en: because I was controversial and polarizing.
translation.zh: 因为我很有争议 很两级分化

translation.en: In the world of boxing, being the villain is the best thing.
translation.zh: 在拳击的世界 做坏人是最好的事情

translation.en: It's Jake Paul.
translation.zh: 我是杰克·保罗

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Hey, boo if Deji's a bitch.
translation.zh: 喂 如果觉得德吉是贱人就发出嘘声

translation.en: [chanting] Fuck Jake Paul! Fuck Jake Paul!
translation.zh: 打倒杰克·保罗！

translation.en: [crowd] Fuck Jake Paul! Fuck Jake Paul!
translation.zh: 打倒杰克·保罗！ 打倒杰克·保罗！

translation.en: [Helwani] The best fighters are the ones who make you feel something.
translation.zh: 最好的打手是让你感觉到一些东西的人

translation.en: If you're being booed and people hate you, that's a good thing.
translation.zh: 如果你被别人嘘声大家讨厌你 这是好事

translation.en: It's better to be the bad guy, the heel.
translation.zh: 做坏人 做反派更好

translation.en: The heel, the bad guy, always draws more money
translation.zh: 大坏人、大反派通常会吸引更多的钱

translation.en: because people now want to pay to see you lose.
translation.zh: 因为人们现在想花钱看你输

translation.en: I'm a cold motherfucker. I'll bet anyone. Any time, any place.
translation.zh: 我是个冷酷的混蛋 谁都行 随时随地奉陪

translation.en: I wanna eat him up! [growling]
translation.zh: 我要打倒他！

translation.en: Too much speed for him. Too fast. Too fast!
translation.zh: 对他来说速度太快了 过于快了

translation.en: You middle-aged Dutch woman, ugly, Napoleon Dynamite-lookin'--
translation.zh: 你打斗像个荷兰中年女人 那么丑看着像《大人物拿破仑》

translation.en: You ain't tough.
translation.zh: 你不够强

translation.en: Gonna kick my arse? Gonna whoop my arse?
translation.zh: 要打败我？挫败我？

translation.en: -Fucking kiss my arse. -[man laughs]
translation.zh: 你等着被我打得屁滚尿流吧

translation.en: -Let's make it happen. -I'm my own boss.
translation.zh: -我们来实现吧-我是自己的老板

translation.en: Two in one night. Got your hat!
translation.zh: 一晚上两个 拿到你的帽子了！

translation.en: You can't touch me. You not man enough. I'll eat your asshole alive, you bitch.
translation.zh: 你不能碰我 你不够男人我会把你打得满地找牙 贱人

translation.en: What the f*** is up, you Irish c***? Good morning--
translation.zh: 你搞什么 你这个爱尔兰贱人？

translation.en: Turns out, we're good at it.
translation.zh: 事实证明 我们很擅长

translation.en: I'mma fuck up Deji, Logan's gonna fuck up KSI…
translation.zh: 我要打败德吉打 洛根要打败KSI…

translation.en: -[Deji shouting] Bor-ing! -…then I'mma fuck up KSI.
translation.zh: -无聊！-…然后我要打败KSI

translation.en: [announcer] From the United States… -[dramatically] …Jake Paul! -[crowd shouting, booing]
translation.zh: 来自美国的杰克·保罗！

translation.en: [Jake] That first fight ended up being
translation.zh: 第一次对战最后变成了

translation.en: the biggest amateur fight in the history of the sport.
translation.zh: 体育历史上最盛大的业余对战

translation.en: Sold more pay-per-views than any other amateur fight in the world.
translation.zh: 付费看节目观众数量比世界其他业余对战都多

translation.en: So there was a ton of pressure.
translation.zh: 所以压力非常大

translation.en: [commentator 1] The arena lets out boos for the American.
translation.zh: 体育馆发出了对这位美国人的嘘声

translation.en: [Jake] That was one of the hardest moments of my life.
translation.zh: 那是我这辈子最艰难的时刻之一

translation.en: -[cheering] -[Jake] Being in front of the crowd. Twenty-five thousand people cheering against me.
translation.zh: 在那么多观众面前2.5万人欢呼让我输

translation.en: Enemy territory. In the UK.
translation.zh: 那是敌人的领地 在英国

translation.en: Not knowing what I was getting myself into.
translation.zh: 根本不知道自己要面对怎样的场景

translation.en: [Jake] And then, the first round, I get popped in the face hard.
translation.zh: 然后第一回合 我的脸被狠狠打了

translation.en: [Jake] My nose is gushing blood. My legs give out.
translation.zh: 我的鼻子在喷血 我的腿发软了

translation.en: Sensory overload. Everything is one giant blur.
translation.zh: 感官超载一切都是一个巨大的模糊影子

translation.en: [Jake] My body was shutting down.
translation.zh: 我的身体在关闭

translation.en: My mind wanted to tell me to stop.
translation.zh: 我的思想告诉我停下来

translation.en: Stop. Stop. Stop.
translation.zh: 停

translation.en: -I felt like I was dying. -[music fades out]
translation.zh: 我感觉自己快死了

translation.en: And… I fucking loved it.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢这种感觉

translation.en: Some other element of me took over.
translation.zh: 我的一些其他元素主宰了

translation.en: -Animal instinct just kicked in. -[commentator 2] Deji is rocked.
translation.zh: 动物的本能开始介入 德吉被打晕了 杰克·保罗正在找机会给出致命一拳 结束这场比赛

translation.en: Jake Paul's looking for the big punch to end this.
translation.zh: 德吉被打晕了 杰克·保罗正在找机会给出致命一拳 结束这场比赛

translation.en: The referee's gonna step in--
translation.zh: 裁判会介入

translation.en: The towel has been thrown in by Deji's corner.
translation.zh: 德吉的拳角那边放弃了

translation.en: And Jake Paul is your winner!
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗获胜！

translation.en: [Logan] I didn't realize how much he wanted to make me proud…
translation.zh: 我当时没意识到他有多想让我骄傲

translation.en: …until after my split-decision loss to KSI.
translation.zh: 直到评委们意见不一致最终判决输给了KSI

translation.en: It was-- It was the weirdest thing, man. It was, you know, a really close fight.
translation.zh: 那真是最奇怪的事 天啊 那场对战真的不相上下

translation.en: Weird call.
translation.zh: 奇怪的判决

translation.en: KSI ended up winning,
translation.zh: KSI最后赢了

translation.en: and I immediately just chalked it up to the game.
translation.zh: 我当场就认为是这次比赛的问题

translation.en: Took the L on the chin. Whatever.
translation.zh: 接受了失败 随便吧

translation.en: But it really affected Jake.
translation.zh: 但这真的影响到了杰克

translation.en: He was in the locker room crying.
translation.zh: 他在更衣室里哭了

translation.en: [quavering] I know. I love you more than anyone in this room.
translation.zh: 我知道 我爱你超过这房间里的任何别人

translation.en: -I don't think love is all you need. -I know.
translation.zh: -对 但我不觉得…-我知道

translation.en: [Logan present] I had wondered why. It was because he wanted it so bad for me.
translation.zh: 我当时不知道为什么但那是因为他太想让我赢了

translation.en: He wanted it more than I did.
translation.zh: 他比我还想要赢

translation.en: He wants the absolute best for me, as I want the absolute best for him.
translation.zh: 他希望我得到最好的结果我也希望他得到最好的结果

translation.en: I love Logan more than anyone in this world.
translation.zh: 我在这个世界上最爱的就是洛根远超过其他人

translation.en: And so for-- for me to see him lose, you know, i-- it just sucked.
translation.zh: 所以我看到他输 这感觉太糟糕了

translation.en: And I'm not playin' around.
translation.zh: 我不是在胡搞

translation.en: I'm taking this sport more seriously than anybody.
translation.zh: 我很严肃看待这项运动远超过任何人

translation.en: So stay tuned. I'm-- I'm finna get these fuckin' knockouts!
translation.zh: 所以持续关注 我要把别人打晕！

translation.en: Team Paul. Join it now.
translation.zh: 支持保罗 现在就加入

translation.en: I would say, for Jake, teaming up with Nakisa Bidarian was brilliant on his part
translation.zh: 我会说 对杰克来说 跟纳基萨·比达里安组队他是非常明智的

translation.en: because Nakisa used to be the CFO of-- of the UFC.
translation.zh: 因为纳基萨以前是终极格斗冠军赛的首席财务官

translation.en: He got a bird's-eye view of the business of fighting.
translation.zh: 他对格斗这个行业有非常敏锐的洞察力

translation.en: They've been together for several years now,
translation.zh: 他们现在已经在一起几年了

translation.en: and it seems like every time, they're just leveling up.
translation.zh: 他们似乎每次都能提升到一个新的高度

translation.en: He's not the guy who does interviews. Lord knows I've asked him.
translation.zh: 他不喜欢参加采访上帝知道我问过了

translation.en: He was the guy behind the scenes, and Jake did all the front-facing stuff.
translation.zh: 他是幕后操纵手杰克负责所有台面上的东西

translation.en: [Nakisa] Someone told me there's this kid who's a YouTuber,
translation.zh: 有人告诉我 有一个孩子是油管网红

translation.en: who also wants to box.
translation.zh: 想要搞拳击

translation.en: It quickly became apparent to me that there was a unique opportunity here
translation.zh: 我迅速意识到 这里有个独特的机会

translation.en: to disrupt fight sports.
translation.zh: 来扰乱格斗运动

translation.en: Not just boxing but also MMA.
translation.zh: 不只是拳击 还有混合武术

translation.en: He had 45 million people that consume his content.
translation.zh: 他有4500万人消费他的内容

translation.en: So if we go and turn this into a fighter,
translation.zh: 所以如果我们把这变成一个打手

translation.en: wow, what a competitive advantage versus any other fighter that's out there.
translation.zh: 这跟其他现有打手对比就太有竞争优势了

translation.en: From the first meeting, I said to him,
translation.zh: 从第一次见面起 我对他说

translation.en: "Unless you learn the craft and the skills of boxing,
translation.zh: “除非你学习了拳击的艺术和技巧

translation.en: I'm not the right person to spend time on this path together with you."
translation.zh: 不然我不是跟你一起花时间走这条路的人选“

translation.en: "Because for you to achieve what I think is possible,
translation.zh: 因为让你能实现我认为可能的事情

translation.en: you can't be a rapper and a YouTuber,
translation.zh: 你不能同时做说唱歌手和油管网红

translation.en: uh, and a dancer and a prankster
translation.zh: 还要做舞者 搞恶作剧

translation.en: and a boxer."
translation.zh: 同时再做拳击手”

translation.en: "You gotta choose one."
translation.zh: “你必须选一个”

translation.en: And that was kinda the start of our evolution together.
translation.zh: 那基本就是我们共同演化的开始

translation.en: -[music ends] -[sighs]
translation.zh: （房主出售）

translation.en: [Jake] I was sick of not being respected.
translation.zh: 我受够了不被尊重

translation.en: I was sick of YouTube. I was sick of the process.
translation.zh: 我受够了油管 那个过程

translation.en: I was like, "Yo, I'm done doing YouTube."
translation.zh: 我心里想“哟 我不搞油管了”

translation.en: "I'm stopping uploading." "I'm not making any more content."
translation.zh: “我要停止上传视频不再创作更多内容了”

translation.en: The reason for moving to Puerto Rico was this is the best place to train.
translation.zh: 搬去波多黎各的原因是这是训练的最佳地方

translation.en: I walk outside of my house, do a four-mile run.
translation.zh: 我走出房子 跑6.5公里

translation.en: No cars. No traffic signals. Like, it's the perfect loop.
translation.zh: 没有车 没有信号灯 非常完美的一圈

translation.en: Perfect nature. Meditation. Peaceful.
translation.zh: 完美的自然 冥想 宁静

translation.en: And then the boxing gym is right down the street.
translation.zh: 然后拳击体育馆就在同一条街尽头

translation.en: And it's awesome to live here with my brother, you know,
translation.zh: 跟我哥哥生活在这里很棒

translation.en: and to be close to him, and perfect for boxing.
translation.zh: 跟他很近 完美适合拳击

translation.en: [Jake] Boxing reinvigorated something inside of me.
translation.zh: 拳击让我内心的一部分重新活了过来

translation.en: It made me feel alive again.
translation.zh: 让我再次感觉自己活着

translation.en: Like I had something to work for.
translation.zh: 感觉我有了努力的目标

translation.en: I think in the YouTube world,
translation.zh: 我认为在油管的世界

translation.en: not only was I not making progress, I was hurting myself.
translation.zh: 我不仅没有取得进步我还在伤害自己

translation.en: I was going the opposite way.
translation.zh: 我适得其反了

translation.en: For the longest time, I-- I didn't like myself.
translation.zh: 很长时间以来 我都不像自己

translation.en: I wasn't happy.
translation.zh: 我并不开心

translation.en: And so when I got into something
translation.zh: 所以当我有机会做点

translation.en: where I could slowly start to make progress,
translation.zh: 我可以慢慢产生进步的事情

translation.en: it brought back happiness in my life.
translation.zh: 让我的人生中重新出现了幸福

translation.en: And boxing gave me that again.
translation.zh: 拳击重新给了我幸福

translation.en: He definitely found something with boxing that, I think, gave him worth,
translation.zh: 他绝对在拳击中找到了什么 给他价值的东西

translation.en: which he hadn't, you know, making stupid insignificant vlogs on YouTube.
translation.zh: 这是他之前 在油管上做那些愚蠢的没意义的视频博客所没有的

translation.en: [Jake] In the world I was living in, I was on top.
translation.zh: 在我生活的世界中 我是顶尖的

translation.en: I was getting a bunch of views. I knew what I was doing.
translation.zh: 我的浏览量很多我知道自己在做什么

translation.en: I had a big ego.
translation.zh: 我的自尊心很强

translation.en: Then I step into the boxing gym, all of that goes out the door.
translation.zh: 然后我走进拳击体育馆把那些全都抛在脑后了

translation.en: Get in the ring with one of these guys, they'll beat your ass.
translation.zh: 跟一个人进入擂台 他们会把你打惨

translation.en: [Logan] It is an incredibly humbling experience
translation.zh: 当你在周三晚上被一个

translation.en: when you get the shit kicked out of you
translation.zh: 没听说过的人打得惨败

translation.en: by some guy you never heard of, in a spa session on Wednesday night.
translation.zh: 那是非常能够让人谦虚的经历

translation.en: But it's incredibly rewarding to get broken down in that way.
translation.zh: 但是这样被打击 回报也非常高

translation.en: [man] This shit is 100%, bro.
translation.zh: 这东西是100% 兄弟

translation.en: Every camp cost a million dollars. I don't know how he playin' with that.
translation.zh: 每个营地都要花一百万美元我不知道他怎么有办法应付的

translation.en: -[music fades] -He could be on a yacht with some chicks.
translation.zh: 他可以跟几个小妞去游艇上

translation.en: Turning it up. Popping bottles in the club.
translation.zh: 开派对 在夜店喝酒

translation.en: He's getting punched every day.
translation.zh: 他每天都被打

translation.en: Right now, uh, 14 days away from the toughest test of my career,
translation.zh: 现在距离我职业生涯中最艰难的考验还有14天

translation.en: Tommy Fury.
translation.zh: 汤米·富里

translation.en: This is the first time I'm fighting a real professional boxer.
translation.zh: 这是我第一次和职业拳击手对战

translation.en: He comes from a legendary bloodline.
translation.zh: 他出生于有传奇血统的家族

translation.en: His dad was a professional boxer.
translation.zh: 他父亲就是职业拳击手

translation.en: His brother was the former heavyweight champion of the world.
translation.zh: 他哥哥是前重量级世界冠军

translation.en: So this fight, this is a massive risk
translation.zh: 所以这场战斗风险巨大

translation.en: that most fighters have never taken this early on in their career.
translation.zh: 多数打手从来没有在职业早期冒这么大的风险

translation.en: [in the ring] Today we have, uh, just a little shadowboxing.
translation.zh: 今天我们要进行一点假想拳击

translation.en: Going through some strategy for the fight.
translation.zh: 温习一下战斗中的策略

translation.en: Bounce. Watch your feet! [whoops]
translation.zh: 小心脚！

translation.en: Jake Paul, I mean he's tough, he has a great chin,
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗 他很强 他不容易被击倒

translation.en: he has speed, he has punching power in both hands.
translation.zh: 他有速度 双手都很有出拳的力量

translation.en: This guy, he's invested 100%,
translation.zh: 这个人投入了100%

translation.en: not just financially but physically and mentally.
translation.zh: 不只是经济上 还有体力上和精神上

translation.en: My name is Ocean Interbeing, and I am Jake's longevity specialist
translation.zh: 我叫欧仕恩·英特比音 我是杰克的长寿专家和力量治疗师

translation.en: and, um, stretch therapist.
translation.zh: 我是杰克的长寿专家和力量治疗师

translation.en: So I do, like, all that kind of ninja healing work.
translation.zh: 我做各种忍者治疗工作

translation.en: [Interbeing] I kinda stumbled across the psychedelic healing state.
translation.zh: 我偶然发现了迷幻治疗状态

translation.en: The guys I was working with, they were, like, burners and PhDs.
translation.zh: 跟我合作的人都是火人和博士

translation.en: So… And they did yoga.
translation.zh: 所以… 他们还做瑜伽

translation.en: So it's just kinda scientific.
translation.zh: 所以这算是有点科学

translation.en: [Jake] I have a breath work coach, as well, to guide me through meditations.
translation.zh: 我还有一个呼吸训练教练帮助指导我进行冥想

translation.en: His name is Lukis Mac.
translation.zh: 他叫卢克斯·麦克

translation.en: We have these ceremonies, as a team,
translation.zh: 我们作为一个团队有这样的仪式

translation.en: where we charge up our energy as a collective.
translation.zh: 我们充满能量 变成一个合集

translation.en: And my teammates send me energy through the ether
translation.zh: 我的队友通过以太传给我能量

translation.en: and send me their visualization and send me their strength and courage.
translation.zh: 传给我他们看到的东西传给我他们的力量和勇气去他的

translation.en: It's such a fuckin' dangerous fight.
translation.zh: 那是如此危险的对战

translation.en: That could potentially derail everything for the rest of his life.
translation.zh: 可能让他余生的一切都脱轨

translation.en: -[Jake breathes loudly] -[Logan] That's why it concerns me.
translation.zh: 所以才让我担心

translation.en: Jake, he's only been boxing for three years.
translation.zh: 杰克 他拳击才打了三年

translation.en: Man, like, he's so new to this sport.
translation.zh: 天啊 他在这项运动中还太年轻了

translation.en: [Nakisa] I saw the opportunity to create a UFC-like platform for boxing,
translation.zh: 我看到了创建一个类似终极格斗冠军赛平台的机会

translation.en: with Jake as the anchor and the face of it.
translation.zh: 跟杰克一起 让他做主持 做脸面

translation.en: He knows marketing really well, and he understands business,
translation.zh: 他非常了解营销 懂生意

translation.en: so together we've been able to have this great partnership.
translation.zh: 所以我们一起合作得非常愉快

translation.en: [Jake] Nakisa is my business partner.
translation.zh: 纳基萨是我的生意合作伙伴

translation.en: He's a numbers genius.
translation.zh: 他是数字上的天才

translation.en: Knows the fight game like the back of his hand.
translation.zh: 对格斗行业了如指掌

translation.en: And together we make an incredible team.
translation.zh: 我们一起组成了一个不可思议的团队

translation.en: Me being a promoter and being a boxer go hand in hand.
translation.zh: 我作为筹办人 作为拳击手两者协同一致

translation.en: It's all one harmony. It's one song. It's one dance.
translation.zh: 非常和谐 像是一首歌曲 一支舞蹈

translation.en: [Nakisa] When we first started working together, we talked about the business strategy
translation.zh: 我们最开始合作的时候聊过生意策略

translation.en: of how we engage different constituencies to be interested in your fights.
translation.zh: 如何让不同的利益群体对你的比赛感兴趣

translation.en: So his first professional fight, he chose a fellow YouTuber.
translation.zh: 所以他的第一场职业比赛我们选了一个同是油管网红的人

translation.en: I got another fight against AnEsonGib.
translation.zh: 我还要跟安伊森吉比比一场

translation.en: He was the next UK YouTuber to go after.
translation.zh: 他是可以追随的下一个英国油管网红

translation.en: We knew it would get a ton of publicity.
translation.zh: 我们知道会得到很多宣传

translation.en: [announcer] Tonight, he makes his professional debut.
translation.zh: 今晚 他要进行职业赛的首秀

translation.en: Here is the American YouTube sensation…
translation.zh: 美国油管网红来了

translation.en: [dramatically] …Jake Paul!
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗！

translation.en: [commentator] Oh! Big right hand that lands.
translation.zh: 右手重重落下一拳

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -[commentator] He's hurt. Gib is hurt!
translation.zh: -他受伤了-吉比受伤了

translation.en: Oh! He's down again!
translation.zh: 现在他又倒下了！

translation.en: Jake Paul with a first-round destruction of AnEsonGib!
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗第一回合摧毁了安伊森吉比

translation.en: [Helwani] Boxing is kind of a hoity-toity sport,
translation.zh: 拳击算是一种傲慢的运动

translation.en: so, initially, I think the old guard boxing community
translation.zh: 所以最开始我以为那些老顽固拳击群体

translation.en: kinda looked down on what these kids were doing.
translation.zh: 瞧不上这些孩子们在做的事情

translation.en: The old guard didn't understand, didn't respect, didn't embrace.
translation.zh: 老顽固之前不理解 不尊重 不接受

translation.en: "What is he? What is this?"
translation.zh: “他是什么？这是什么？”

translation.en: Like, "Is this boxing? Is this entertainment? Is it a circus?"
translation.zh: 会想“这是拳击吗？这是娱乐吗？这是马戏团吗？”

translation.en: A lot of these YouTube guys are thinking that it's a joke.
translation.zh: 很多油管的人觉得这是个玩笑

translation.en: You know, to make it kind of like a circus act is not cool.
translation.zh: 把拳击搞得像马戏团一样一点都不好看 （杰克·保罗让拳击来到了“低谷”）

translation.en: There were tons of boxing purists saying like, "No."
translation.zh: 有很多拳击纯粹主义者说“不行”

translation.en: Trying to protect their sport.
translation.zh: 试着保护他们的运动

translation.en: They didn't know how much this sport meant to me.
translation.zh: 他们不知道这项运动对我意义重大

translation.en: They didn't know my plans.
translation.zh: 他们不知道我的计划

translation.en: From there, there was a process of figuring out,
translation.zh: 从那时候 就有这样一个探索的过程

translation.en: "Can we keep elevating the level of competition every single time?"
translation.zh: “我们可以每次比赛都提高一个水平吗？”

translation.en: [Jake] People were like, "Fight a real athlete, not just these YouTubers."
translation.zh: 人们会说“去跟真正的运动员对战别跟这些油管网红打”

translation.en: I was like, "All right. Nate Robinson's talking shit."
translation.zh: 于是我说“好吧 内特·罗宾逊在放屁”

translation.en: "Is buff. Is fast."
translation.zh: “很强 很快”

translation.en: "I'll fight him."
translation.zh: “我跟他打”

translation.en: When he fought Nate Robinson, that was shocking for many people
translation.zh: 他跟内特·罗宾逊打的时候很多人感到很震惊

translation.en: that a YouTuber was fighting a professional athlete.
translation.zh: 一个油管网红要跟一个职业运动员打

translation.en: There were literally articles that said,
translation.zh: 真的有文章说

translation.en: "It's irresponsible to put this YouTuber in there with this unbelievable athlete."
translation.zh: “把这个油管网红跟异常优秀的运动员放在一起对战 非常不负责任”

translation.en: -[commentator 1] Oh, bro! -[commentator 2] ♪ Let me stand ♪
translation.zh: -兄弟！-让我站起来

translation.en: [commentator 3] Wow, Snoop Dogg is-- is singing the hymns.
translation.zh: 哇 史努比·狗狗在唱赞美诗

translation.en: Nothing funny about what's happenin' with Nate Robinson. He's tryin' to get--
translation.zh: 但内特·罗宾逊发生的事情一点都不好玩 -他在试图…-再见了

translation.en: -[commentator 4] Goodnight Irene. -[commentator 3] Oh no! That's it!
translation.zh: -他在试图…-再见了 这是… 天啊！问题儿童！

translation.en: Mamma mia! The Problem Child!
translation.zh: 这是… 天啊！问题儿童！

translation.en: [Nakisa] Then he knocked out the unbelievable athlete, viciously.
translation.zh: 然后他恶毒地把异常优秀的运动员打晕了

translation.en: Then articles said it was irresponsible to put the NBA athlete in there
translation.zh: 然后他们说把NBA运动员跟学习拳击的油管网红

translation.en: with the YouTuber who's learning how to box.
translation.zh: 放在一起打 很不负责任

translation.en: ♪ Where the fuck Should I really even start? ♪
translation.zh: 我该从哪里开始呢？

translation.en: [Jake] People don't realize
translation.zh: 人们没意识到这首先是一门生意

translation.en: it's a business first. It's an entertainment first.
translation.zh: 人们没意识到这首先是一门生意 这首先是娱乐

translation.en: And the better you are at marketing, the more entertaining you are,
translation.zh: 你越擅长营销 你越会娱乐

translation.en: the more people are gonna buy your fights.
translation.zh: 就会有更多人买你的比赛

translation.en: You know, that's where "the Problem Child" came from.
translation.zh: 这就是“问题儿童”的来源

translation.en: I've always had that shit-talkin' nature.
translation.zh: （问题儿童） 我一直都有言语激怒别人的天性

translation.en: Growing up, all the uncles would be talking shit to each other,
translation.zh: 小时候 各位叔叔都会说激怒别人的话

translation.en: yelling at each other, insulting each other.
translation.zh: 对彼此大吼 侮辱彼此

translation.en: And so it's just always been a part of me.
translation.zh: 所以这一只是我生命中的一部分

translation.en: [Helwani] Jake is one of those guys. He doesn't mind being the bad guy.
translation.zh: 杰克就是那种人 他不介意做坏人

translation.en: And what did he do? Which I thought was a brilliant move.
translation.zh: 而他做了什么？我觉得那是很棒的一步

translation.en: He didn't just pick a fight with one good guy,
translation.zh: 他不只是跟一个好人打了一场

translation.en: he picked a fight with an entire sport.
translation.zh: 他跟整个运动打了一场

translation.en: He said, "All right, let me call out MMA. No one's fighting these MMA guys."
translation.zh: 他说：“好 让我挑战混合武术没人跟这些搞混合武术的人打”

translation.en: "And see if I can get every MMA fan,
translation.zh: 看看我能否让每一个混合武术粉丝

translation.en: every MMA promoter, every MMA coach, every MMA fighter on the planet
translation.zh: 每一个混合武术筹办人 教练地球上每一个混合武术打手

translation.en: to talk about me and hate me." And it worked!
translation.zh: 去谈论我 去憎恨我 最后成功了

translation.en: Dana, pay your fighters more. Give them healthcare, you scumbag.
translation.zh: 该终结这种糟糕的状况了 大拿 大拿 给你的打手涨工资 给他们医疗保险 你这个混蛋

translation.en: Greedy, old, lonely, bald bitch!
translation.zh: 贪婪、孤独、秃头的老贱种

translation.en: Dana White diss-track out now. Got my Dana White piñata. About to--
translation.zh: 跟白大拿撕逼的歌曲现在发布了我弄了一个白大拿皮纳塔 我马上就要击打它…

translation.en: [Nakisa] When Jake started attacking Dana White, we said, "Okay, what's the next right step?"
translation.zh: 杰克开始攻击白大拿的时候我们说“下一步正确的做法是什么？”

translation.en: "Here's an MMA guy, Ben Askren, who isn't an amazing striker
translation.zh: 有一个搞混合武术的人本·阿斯科伦 这个人不太擅长攻击

translation.en: but has never been knocked out by punches, has great championship pedigree."
translation.zh: 但是从来没有被人用拳头打晕他有着非常优秀的冠军谱系

translation.en: I wanna fight the biggest names in the sport.
translation.zh: 我想跟体育界最有名的人战斗

translation.en: UFC fighters like Ben Askren.
translation.zh: 本·阿斯科伦这样的终极格斗打手

translation.en: Put them in a ring and go head-to-head with them.
translation.zh: 把他们放进擂台 跟他们硬碰硬格斗

translation.en: Yes, Mr. Jake Paul, I do accept. I'm gonna make a whole bunch of money
translation.zh: 对 杰克·保罗 我接受 我会赚一大笔钱

translation.en: to beat up a guy who is pretending to be an athlete.
translation.zh: 去打败一个假装自己是运动员的人

translation.en: Hilarious, buddy. Stand up straight when I'm talking to you.
translation.zh: 真好笑 兄弟我跟你说话的时候 你站直了

translation.en: Slouchin' like a bitch.
translation.zh: 像个贱人一样无精打采

translation.en: -Bring it in, guys. -[man] Let's go, baby!
translation.zh: -喂 放马过来 各位-来吧 宝贝！

translation.en: -How many days? -[entourage] Twenty-two! -How many days? -Twenty-two!
translation.zh: -喂 多少天？-22！

translation.en: -[all] One, two, three, win! -[Jake] Let's fucking go! [whoops]
translation.zh: -一、二、三-胜利！ 我们走吧

translation.en: [present] Promotion, it's an art.
translation.zh: 宣传 这是一门艺术

translation.en: Everything's a storyline to engage the audience.
translation.zh: 一切都是故事情节为了吸引观众持续关注

translation.en: I utilize the most powerful tool in the world, the phone,
translation.zh: 我会使用世界上最强大的工具 手机

translation.en: to create those storylines,
translation.zh: 来制造这些故事情节

translation.en: daily, two times daily, three times daily.
translation.zh: 每天创造一次、两次、三次

translation.en: Tweets flying out. Prank calling my opponents' coaches.
translation.zh: 疯狂发推特给对手的教练打恶搞电话

translation.en: Making TikToks. Shit-talking their whole family. Roasting them.
translation.zh: 制作抖音 出口骂他们全家开他们好笑的玩笑

translation.en: [man] Ben Askren, is it true that you play Napoleon Dynamite?
translation.zh: 本·阿斯科伦你真的演过《大人物拿破仑》吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -You fucked up, Ben.
translation.zh: 是的 你完蛋了 本

translation.en: And April 17th, I promise to make you go down in history…
translation.zh: 4月17号 我会让你在历史上沉沦

translation.en: [chuckles] …as the world's worst UFC fighter.
translation.zh: 变成终极格斗冠军赛世界最差打手

translation.en: I stepped in a cage with trained killers.
translation.zh: 我跟训练有素的杀手一起走进笼子那些人都是以打斗为生的

translation.en: Guys who did this for a living. Jake Paul is a YouTube star.
translation.zh: 我跟训练有素的杀手一起走进笼子那些人都是以打斗为生的 杰克·保罗是个油管网红

translation.en: Jake Paul isn't a fuckin' boxer. This guy's a fuckin' YouTube kid.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗才不是拳击手这人就是个油管小屁孩

translation.en: -I'll bet a million dollars… -[Tyson scoffs]
translation.zh: 我赌100万美元…

translation.en: -Oh, here we go. -…that he loses this fuckin' fight.
translation.zh: -来吧-…他会输掉比赛

translation.en: -Dana White! -[Tyson] What?!
translation.zh: 白大拿！

translation.en: It's literally a video game that I get to play in real life.
translation.zh: 这真的就是我在现实生活中玩的电子游戏

translation.en: Oh, the whole MMA world hates me.
translation.zh: 整个混合武术世界都讨厌我

translation.en: All of these UFC people hate me.
translation.zh: 所有那些终极格斗冠军赛的人都讨厌我

translation.en: The boxing purists hate me.
translation.zh: 拳击纯粹主义者讨厌我

translation.en: So they're gonna tune in,
translation.zh: 所以他们会收看

translation.en: wanting and paying to hopefully see me get knocked out.
translation.zh: 想花钱看我被别人打晕

translation.en: -[dramatic music playing] -[audience booing]
translation.zh: （杰克·保罗 俄亥俄州 克利夫兰记录：2-0 2败）

translation.en: [commentator 1] Jake Paul sparred with former world champion Jean Pascal--
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗跟世界冠军让·帕斯卡打斗…

translation.en: [commentator 2] Get my money, Jake. Get my motherfuckin' money!
translation.zh: 不要让我白花钱 杰克你他妈不要让我白花钱 杰克！

translation.en: -Get my motherfuckin' money, Jake! -[commentator 1] Holy shit!
translation.zh: -不要让我白花钱 杰克！-我去！

translation.en: [commentator 2] Get my motherfuckin' money!
translation.zh: 不要让我白花钱！

translation.en: -[music intensifies] -What?!
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -No! -What?!
translation.zh: -不是吧！-什么？

translation.en: It's over!
translation.zh: 结束了！

translation.en: Jake Paul!
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗！

translation.en: Oh! Oh my God!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: Jake Paul just rocked Askren.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗刚刚打倒了阿斯科伦

translation.en: -Fuck! -[speaking German]
translation.zh: 操！

translation.en: Wow! The Problem Child! Argh!
translation.zh: 问题儿童！

translation.en: Take him seriously, I guess. Who's next? Let's go!
translation.zh: 看来要把他当一回事了下一个是谁？我们拭目以待

translation.en: [announcer] Tonight, making his boxing debut,
translation.zh: 今晚进行他的拳击首秀

translation.en: former UFC Welterweight Champion of the World…
translation.zh: 前终极格斗冠军赛中量级世界冠军

translation.en: [dramatically] …Tyron Woodley!
translation.zh: 泰伦·伍德利！

translation.en: [commentator 1] The crowd, electric.
translation.zh: 观众充满兴奋

translation.en: The action, underway.
translation.zh: 行动正在进行

translation.en: Paul-- A jab-- Another jab by Paul.
translation.zh: 保罗… 保罗再次重击伍德利

translation.en: [commentator 2] I think we can finally put to rest the question,
translation.zh: 我觉得我们这个问题终于没有争议了“他是一个打手吗？”

translation.en: "Is he a fighter?" I think, tonight, he's proving he is a fighter.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们这个问题终于没有争议了“他是一个打手吗？” 我觉得今晚 他证明了自己是个打手

translation.en: -[commentator 1] Right uppercut. -[announcer] And still undefeated…
translation.zh: 右侧上勾拳 还没有被打败

translation.en: [dramatically] …the Problem Child,
translation.zh: 问题儿童

translation.en: Jake Paul!
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗！

translation.en: How 'bout this? We are back. Jake Paul, Tyron Woodley 2.
translation.zh: 怎么样？我们回来了 杰克·保罗与泰伦·伍德利第二次比赛

translation.en: I got a gift for you.
translation.zh: 我有礼物给你

translation.en: I got you a gift.
translation.zh: 我有礼物给你

translation.en: -For-- -What do we have?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: [Jake] It's a Rolex.
translation.zh: 是劳力士

translation.en: You're giving this to him, why?
translation.zh: 你要把这个给他 为什么？

translation.en: -'Cause it's time for me to knock him out. -[music stops]
translation.zh: 因为我该把他打晕了

translation.en: -[announcer] Showtime! -[music restarts]
translation.zh: 表演时间！

translation.en: -[commentator] Just stepping through the-- -[crowd roaring]
translation.zh: 走过…

translation.en: [referee] No, stay out!
translation.zh: 不行 下来

translation.en: [man] Give it up. Give it up. Give it up.
translation.zh: 这里需要帮忙！

translation.en: [Logan] I don't know what the fuck is going on.
translation.zh: 我不知道发生了什么

translation.en: My little brother, a fucking random YouTube kid from Ohio,
translation.zh: 我弟 一个来自俄亥俄的普通油管网红小子

translation.en: is knocking out the greatest combat sports fighters ever.
translation.zh: 打倒了最伟大的格斗运动打手

translation.en: What-- Wha-- How do you process that?
translation.zh: 你要怎么理解这件事？

translation.en: As a result of that knockout, Jake became an overnight sensation.
translation.zh: 这次的胜利让杰克一夜成名

translation.en: Jake Paul's entry in the world of boxing has gone from strength to strength.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗进入拳击世界强大不可小觑

translation.en: Who has knocked out more UFC veterans than Jake Paul?
translation.zh: 还有谁比杰克·保罗打倒了更多的终极格斗冠军赛老将？

translation.en: Look, this is an MMA champion.
translation.zh: 听着 这是一个混合武术冠军

translation.en: -[anchor 1] Knocked out cold. -[anchor 2] Paul scored a brutal knockout.
translation.zh: 打得对方无法动弹 保罗残酷将对方打晕得分

translation.en: He got him with a right hook. It was bad! He hit him so hard, dude.
translation.zh: 保罗用右勾拳把他打晕了好严重！他打得好用力 兄弟

translation.en: [commentator] Say what you will about the Problem Child, he delivers.
translation.zh: 所以不管你怎么说问题儿童他胜利了

translation.en: -1.3 million pay-per-view buys. -[Logan] Oh my God.
translation.zh: -付费看节目的人有130万-天啊

translation.en: -At how much? -Fifty dollars.
translation.zh: -每一个人多少钱？-50美元

translation.en: [Logan laughing] Oh my fucking God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: You headlined a $60-million pay-per-view fight.
translation.zh: 你的对战付费观看赚了六千万美元 上了头条

translation.en: Oh my God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: [present] Doesn't feel like a little brother anymore.
translation.zh: 感觉已经不再像是弟弟了

translation.en: He's done things that I have not and will not and cannot do.
translation.zh: 他做了我没有做不会做 也做不到的事情

translation.en: He's his own fucking entity.
translation.zh: 他是他自己的实体

translation.en: I love what he's doing. Promotion's off the chart.
translation.zh: 我喜欢他做的事情 宣传非常成功 他很搞笑 盛气凌人

translation.en: He's hilarious, brash.
translation.zh: 宣传非常成功 他很搞笑 盛气凌人

translation.en: One of the smartest marketers the fucking sport has ever seen.
translation.zh: 体育界见到过的最聪明的营销者之一

translation.en: [Jake] Nurse! I broke my back carrying the last five fights' promotion.
translation.zh: 护士！我背负着前面五个打手宣传失败的重担 后背受伤了

translation.en: -You're used to this. -My opponents never sell shit.
translation.zh: -你已经习惯了-我的对手从来不卖座

translation.en: -Mouth-to-mouth? -It hurts!
translation.zh: -嘴对嘴？-好痛！

translation.en: -Mouth-to-mouth? -These motherfuckers never sell shit!
translation.zh: 这些混蛋从来不卖座！

translation.en: [man] How do you feel about YouTube fighters? Do you think they belong in the sport?
translation.zh: 你对油管打手是什么感觉你觉得他们属于体育吗？

translation.en: Well, listen. My ego says so many things.
translation.zh: 听着 我的自尊说了很多话

translation.en: Forbes said you made $40 million last year in boxing.
translation.zh: 福布斯说你去年拳击赚了四千万美元

translation.en: But my reality is boxing was pretty much a dying sport.
translation.zh: 但我的现实是拳击基本是一种奄奄一息的运动了

translation.en: Jake Paul's fight brought in $75 million this weekend.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗的对战本周末赚了7500万美元

translation.en: The biggest pay-per-view event of the year.
translation.zh: 付费看节目年度之最

translation.en: Jake Paul, him and his brother, man.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗和他哥哥 天啊

translation.en: These guys have brought boxing back to life.
translation.zh: 这些人让拳击复活了

translation.en: I know it's hard to believe.
translation.zh: 我知道这很难相信

translation.en: Twenty-five million views?
Boxing's going back thanks to the YouTube boxers.
translation.zh: 多亏油管拳击手 拳击复活了

translation.en: Jake said, "Hey, I wanna start a fighters' union."
translation.zh: 杰克说：“喂我想创办一个拳击手联盟”

translation.en: I said, "Listen, I'm not the guy for that."
translation.zh: 我说：“听着 我可不适合做这个”

translation.en: "I'm not trying to be the face of a fighters' union with you."
translation.zh: “我可不想跟你一起去做一个拳击手联盟的门面”

translation.en: [Jake] The old guard, the Dana Whites,
translation.zh: 拳击界的老派守护者白大拿

translation.en: these old promoters and capitalists prey on young fighters.
translation.zh: 这些老牌筹办人和资本家猎食新人拳击手

translation.en: They don't give a fuck about you.
translation.zh: 他们根本不在乎你

translation.en: So I want there to be a fighters' union.
translation.zh: 所以我希望能有一个打手联盟

translation.en: To demand long-term healthcare, to demand fighter minimums
translation.zh: 要求提供长期医保要求给拳击手和混合武术打手

translation.en: for boxers and MMA fighters.
translation.zh: 设定最低薪酬

translation.en: I've been in the gym, and I've seen how hard these guys work
translation.zh: 我去过了健身房看到了这些人工作有多努力

translation.en: and how mistreated they are.
translation.zh: 给他们的待遇有多不公平

translation.en: So, you know, I wanna create a fighters' union.
translation.zh: 所以 你们知道我想创建一个打手联盟

translation.en: Jake was calling out the beloved promoter of the UFC, Dana White,
translation.zh: 杰克是在公开挑战终极格斗冠军赛备受喜爱的筹办人白大拿

translation.en: and he was poking them and talking about their business.
translation.zh: 他在刺痛他们 谈论他们的生意

translation.en: [Jake] This is the most dangerous sport in the world,
translation.zh: 这是世界上最危险的体育运动

translation.en: and the UFC, you know, makes billions of dollars a year,
translation.zh: 终极格斗冠军赛每年能赚几百万美元

translation.en: and they're only paying their fighters 15% of that.
translation.zh: 他们只给打手付了收益的15%

translation.en: But then I noticed that there was a consistent diminishing of Jake Paul
translation.zh: 但我注意到白大拿在持续不断地轻视

translation.en: by Dana White.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗

translation.en: They went from, "That fight was fixed" to "He's on steroids."
translation.zh: 从最开始的“那比赛结果是预定好的”到“他吃了兴奋剂”

translation.en: That was really the breaking point for me to say, "Okay, Jake."
translation.zh: 这时候我才真正做出决定去说“好 杰克”

translation.en: "Let's have a focus on getting fighters paid more."
translation.zh: “我们来专注于让打手们获得更高的酬劳”

translation.en: "Let's have a focus on giving women the opportunity in boxing."
translation.zh: “我们来专注于给女性进入拳击的机会”

translation.en: Boom.
translation.zh: 嘭

translation.en: Enter Amanda Serrano, one of the greatest fighters ever.
translation.zh: 阿曼达·塞拉诺来了历史上最伟大的打手之一

translation.en: For the longest time, no one promoted her the right way.
translation.zh: 长久以来没有谁以正确的方式帮她宣传

translation.en: [Helwani] Amanda Serrano was fighting for a decade and not making much money,
translation.zh: 阿曼达·塞拉诺做了十年的打手却没赚到很多钱

translation.en: wasn't getting the attention and respect she deserved.
translation.zh: 没有得到她该有的关注和尊重

translation.en: Well look at her now, headlining MSG, making seven figures.
translation.zh: 看看她现在 成为麦迪逊广场花园的头条 赚七位数薪酬

translation.en: The highest in women's boxing history.
translation.zh: 是女性拳击历史上的最高薪酬

translation.en: So out with the old, in with the new, and it's gonna take some time,
translation.zh: 所以老旧的东西要去掉了让新的东西进来 这需要一些时间

translation.en: but the revolution has started.
translation.zh: 但是革命已经开始了

translation.en: Stop asking me about Jake Paul. I don't give a shit. Anderson Silva.
translation.zh: 别再问我杰克·保罗的事了 我不在乎 安德森·席尔瓦

translation.en: We honestly need to start talking again about hi-- this guy as the GOAT.
translation.zh: 我们真的需要再次聊起这个人作为历史上最伟大的人

translation.en: One of the greatest of all time. Possibly even the greatest of all time.
translation.zh: 历史上最伟大的人之一也可能是历史上最伟大的那一个

translation.en: And I fuckin' guarantee you this,
translation.zh: 我向你们保证

translation.en: you ain't gonna see Jake Paul calling Anderson Silva out.
translation.zh: 你们不会看到杰克·保罗邀请安德森·席尔瓦大战

translation.en: That I fuckin' promise you. Jake?
translation.zh: 我可以向你们保证 杰克？

translation.en: Jake?
translation.zh: 杰克？

translation.en: Jake?
translation.zh: 杰克？

translation.en: Guess who?
translation.zh: 猜猜是谁？

translation.en: [speaker] Jake Paul is facing his toughest test in his career.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗即将面对职业生涯最艰难考验

translation.en: [speaker] Anderson Silva, one of the greatest MMA fighters of all time.
translation.zh: 安德森·席尔瓦 历史上最伟大的混合武术打手之一

translation.en: To tell you the truth, there are some on Jake's team
translation.zh: 告诉你们实话 杰克的团队里有人

translation.en: who advised him not to take this fight.
translation.zh: 建议他不要参加这场比赛

translation.en: I think he's a little bit crazy.
translation.zh: 我觉得他有点疯狂

translation.en: [anchor] Massive fight coming up. We have Jake Paul, Anderson Silva,
translation.zh: 盛大比赛即将上演 我们有杰克·保罗、安德森·席尔瓦

translation.en: one of the greatest UFC athletes ever.
translation.zh: 终极格斗冠军赛历史上最伟大的运动员之一

translation.en: Yes, Jake Paul is going to box Anderson Silva.
translation.zh: 对 杰克·保罗即将与安德森·席尔瓦进行拳击对战

translation.en: [man] This is a real-ass fight right here.
translation.zh: 这是一场严肃的对战

translation.en: There's real stakes in the future of Jake Paul,
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗的未来有巨大的风险

translation.en: because it could go badly right here.
translation.zh: 因为这里保罗可能会变得很惨

translation.en: Dude, let's say he knocks Jake Paul out, potentially even viciously.
translation.zh: 兄弟 假如他把杰克·保罗打倒了 也有可能更恶毒

translation.en: Real bad shit could happen to a guy who may not be ready for it.
translation.zh: 对一个没准备好的人可能会发生很糟糕的情况

translation.en: Fight's gonna be real bad for him.
translation.zh: 这场对战他可能会出现很惨烈的结局
