translation.en: Real bad for him.
translation.zh: 真的会很惨烈

translation.en: -How you feelin'? -[Jake] Good. Just chillin'.
translation.zh: -你感觉如何？-很好 很放松

translation.en: [Logan] Uh, are you and Jake on good terms?
translation.zh: 你跟杰克关系好吗？

translation.en: The last time I checked, you guys weren't, like, speaking.
translation.zh: 我上次听说 你们都不说话了

translation.en: I think we're good, but I didn't think we were bad when it went bad.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们很好但是不好的时候 我没觉得不好

translation.en: [chuckles] You know what I'm saying? When he shut me off, there was no warning.
translation.zh: 你懂我在说什么吗？ 他把我打晕的时候 都没有警告

translation.en: It was weird.
translation.zh: 真的很奇怪

translation.en: [Logan] So you guys are good now, but you haven't talked about it?
translation.zh: 所以你们现在好了但你们还没有聊过这件事？

translation.en: -Just gotta tell him you love him. -[chewing gum]
translation.zh: 告诉他 你爱他

translation.en: -[crowd] Fuck Jake Paul! Fuck Jake Paul! -[subdued music playing]
translation.zh: 打倒杰克·保罗！

translation.en: [Logan] Jake's birthday, we all flew to Utah, in this cabin.
translation.zh: 杰克的生日我们乘坐客舱飞到了犹他州

translation.en: Jake was pretty fucked up. So was my dad.
translation.zh: 杰克喝得烂醉 我爸爸也是

translation.en: It was a big group of people there.
translation.zh: 那里有很大一群人

translation.en: And Jake mentioned my dad abusing him as a-- as a child.
translation.zh: 杰克提到 我爸爸小时候虐待他

translation.en: They got in a huge argument.
translation.zh: 他们发生了激烈的争吵

translation.en: And it hurt Jake so much
translation.zh: 这让杰克很受伤

translation.en: that my dad refused to acknowledge
translation.zh: 因为我爸爸拒绝承认

translation.en: the physical hardship that he put us through when we were young.
translation.zh: 在我们小时候他让我们承受的身体上的痛苦

translation.en: We've been through some shit, dude.
translation.zh: 我们真的经历过很糟糕的事情

translation.en: It wasn't fun.
translation.zh: 并不好玩

translation.en: It was fucking torture, bro.
translation.zh: 那绝对是折磨 兄弟

translation.en: But when you survive that kind of shit, you become tough as fuck.
translation.zh: 但是当你经历了这种破事活了下来 你就会无比坚强

translation.en: Jake is still traumatized to this day about how my dad treated him.
translation.zh: 我爸爸对待杰克的方式让杰克至今都有创伤

translation.en: And they still don't get along like they should.
translation.zh: 他们至今也没有像正常父子那样关系要好

translation.en: Fuckin' get over it, Jake! I'm sorry!
translation.zh: 忘了这件事吧 杰克 我很抱歉

translation.en: Look what has happened in your life!
translation.zh: 看看你人生中发生了什么事

translation.en: I have a hard time understanding why the-- the trauma from Jake's childhood
translation.zh: 我很难理解杰克童年的创伤为什么

translation.en: still affects him, knowing the monster that it created
translation.zh: 至今依然影响着他 知道这创伤制造的怪物

translation.en: and what that monster is doing in his life.
translation.zh: 那个怪物在对他的人生做什么

translation.en: [announcer] A unanimous decision in favor of the winner
translation.zh: 全场一致的决定 偏向获胜者

translation.en: and still undefeated,
translation.zh: 依然不败

translation.en: the Problem Child…
translation.zh: 问题儿童

translation.en: [dramatically] …Jake Paul!
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗！

translation.en: Anyone. Anytime. Anyplace.
translation.zh: 谁都行 随时随地奉陪

translation.en: Anyone. Anytime. Anyplace.
translation.zh: 谁都行 随时随地奉陪

translation.en: Real dog! Real dog!
translation.zh: 真男人！

translation.en: -[continues whooping] Real dog! -[men applauding]
translation.zh: 真男人！

translation.en: [Jake whooping] Let's go!
translation.zh: 我们走！

translation.en: I did not wanna fuckin' lose on Netflix.
translation.zh: 我可不想在Netflix上面输

translation.en: A hundred and eighty-three countries or some shit. I'm not fuckin' losing.
translation.zh: 130多个国家都在观看我他妈才不能输

translation.en: Oh my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Argh! Let's go!
translation.zh: 我们走！

translation.en: [Jake] Six and oh, baby. Six and oh.
translation.zh: 六比零 宝贝 六比零

translation.en: What you gonna say now to the Problem Child?
translation.zh: 你要说什么？杰克问题儿童

translation.en: [man] Jake Paul, you're not fighting boxers!
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗你没有跟真正的拳击手对战

translation.en: You're beating up on cats that don't box.
translation.zh: 你战胜的都不是搞拳击的人

translation.en: -Why you calling yourself a boxer? -[subdued music playing]
translation.zh: 你为什么称呼自己是拳击手？

translation.en: I am not gonna respect this clown until he faces a real professional fighter.
translation.zh: 我不会尊重这个小丑 直到他面对一个真正的职业打手

translation.en: [man] Jake Paul is not a professional boxer.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗不是职业拳击手

translation.en: If he fought a boxer, it would not go well.
translation.zh: 如果他对战一个拳击手结局可能就不好了

translation.en: In boxing, my goal is to have some of the biggest pay-per-views
translation.zh: 在拳击中 我的目标是创造出体育历史中付费看节目

translation.en: in the history of the sport.
translation.zh: 创收之最

translation.en: After Silva, it was back to the drawing board.
translation.zh: 席尔瓦之后 好像就回到了最开始

translation.en: Because with the right opponent,
translation.zh: 因为有了好机会

translation.en: we could sell a million pay-per-views, for sure.
translation.zh: 我们绝对可以付费观看卖出一百万

translation.en: Someone has to have a name.
translation.zh: 必须有人提出一个名字

translation.en: They have to be a way tougher opponent than my last one.
translation.zh: 必须是比我上一个对手要强很多的对手

translation.en: There has to be a real risk.
translation.zh: 必须要冒真正的风险

translation.en: Now, do they bring something to the table as far as promotion?
translation.zh: 现在 他们在宣传方面会带来有价值的东西吗？

translation.en: Are they exciting? Are they entertaining?
translation.zh: 他们让人激动吗？有娱乐性吗？

translation.en: Are they likeable? Will people be on their side?
translation.zh: 大家喜欢他们吗？大家会站在他那边吗？

translation.en: [Jake] But most important here…
translation.zh: 但这里最重要的？

translation.en: the storyline.
translation.zh: 是故事情节

translation.en: Everyone said to Jake Paul…
translation.zh: 所有人都对杰克·保罗说

translation.en: Their number-one criticism to me is, "Fight a real boxer."
translation.zh: 他们对我最大的诟病是“找一个真正的拳击手对打”

translation.en: [present] So I'm just taking all of these storylines…
translation.zh: 所以我要采纳所有这些故事情节

translation.en: -[Logan] That's fire. -…using them to my advantage.
translation.zh: 这会很激动人心 我去利用这些

translation.en: [footage] Yeah, it's really good. Just a couple of small notes.
translation.zh: 对 真的很好 再来几个小的点评

translation.en: To try and make the biggest money fight there is.
translation.zh: 试着打造赚钱最多对战

translation.en: [Jake] Beautiful day for a walk.
translation.zh: 天气不错 很适合散步

translation.en: Hey! Um, why are you with him? He hasn't even fought a real boxer yet.
translation.zh: 喂你怎么跟他一起？他都没有对打过一个真正的拳击手

translation.en: [Kellerman] Jake Paul should be fighting a real fighter.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗应该跟一个真正的拳击手对战

translation.en: [man] He has to face real opponents. Not somebody like Woodley!
translation.zh: -他必须对抗真正的对手-而不是伍德利那样的人

translation.en: Jake! When you gonna fight a real boxer?
translation.zh: 杰克！你什么时候能跟真正的拳击手对战？

translation.en: [Mora] I'm not gonna respect Jake Paul until he faces a professional fighter.
translation.zh: 我不会尊重杰克·保罗直到他对战一个职业打手

translation.en: [man] Fighting non-boxers! I am not impressed.
translation.zh: -对战非拳击手-我不觉得厉害

translation.en: Hey, is that Jake Paul? Hey, fight a real boxer, pussy.
translation.zh: 喂 那是杰克·保罗吗？喂 去跟真正的拳击手对战 软蛋

translation.en: -[gasping] -Babe! Babe! What's wrong? What's wrong?
translation.zh: 喂 宝贝 怎么了？

translation.en: I dreamt everyone was telling me to fight a real boxer.
translation.zh: 我做梦了 每个人都叫我去跟真正的拳击手对战

translation.en: Oh, it's Nakisa, my manager.
translation.zh: 哦 是纳基萨 我的经纪人

translation.en: [sighs with relief] Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: -No! -[menacing string music playing]
translation.zh: 不是吧！

translation.en: [speaker] The talk is over.
translation.zh: 舆论终于结束了

translation.en: Finally, the moment we all have been waiting for,
translation.zh: 我们一直等待的时刻终于到了

translation.en: Jake Paul versus Tommy Fury.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗 对战 汤米·富里

translation.en: Sunday night, under the lights at breathtaking Diriyah.
translation.zh: 周日晚 就在风景绝美的迪里耶灯光下

translation.en: [John Fury] Great things come out of crazy situations,
translation.zh: 疯狂的情况会创造出伟大的事情

translation.en: and this Jake Paul, Tommy Fury thing is crazy.
translation.zh: 这场杰克·保罗和汤米·富里的对战太疯狂了

translation.en: On paper, it's crazy.
translation.zh: 理论上 太疯狂了

translation.en: But look at the people flockin' 'ere to see it.
translation.zh: 但看看蜂拥到这里看这场比赛的人群

translation.en: It's the biggest fight in the world!
translation.zh: 这是全世界最大的对战

translation.en: It's global.
translation.zh: 全球都在关注

translation.en: This little guy is knocking out guys he's not supposed to knock out
translation.zh: 这个小家伙打倒了他本来不应该打倒的很多人

translation.en: and brings 70 million to each fight.
translation.zh: 对战的时候赚了7000万

translation.en: That's insane!
translation.zh: 太疯狂了

translation.en: You just don't see that in fighting. That's for big Hollywood stars.
translation.zh: 对战中是看不到这种场景的只有好莱坞明星能有这种阵仗

translation.en: You know, that's the thing that makes it interesting.
translation.zh: 这才是有趣的地方

translation.en: [speaker] Ladies and gentlemen, this fight is for real.
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 这场对战厉害了

translation.en: I'm joined here by Jake Paul, the Problem Child,
translation.zh: 我们节目请来了问题儿童杰克·保罗

translation.en: who's on his phone right now.
translation.zh: 现在

translation.en: [Jake] I'm-- I'm live-streaming. On Instagram.
translation.zh: 我正在照片墙上直播

translation.en: I'm just getting the viewers to go over to YouTube.
translation.zh: 我在让观众都转移到油管

translation.en: [Abdallah] At the very end, a man that needs no introduction, John Fury.
translation.zh: 在最后面的是完全不需要介绍的男人 约翰·富里

translation.en: If you understand conventional boxing like I do,
translation.zh: 如果你像我一样懂传统拳击

translation.en: it's a different world to what Jake Paul's seen.
translation.zh: 那跟杰克·保罗看到的世界完全不一样

translation.en: You can't cross over to professional boxing overnight
translation.zh: 你没办法一夜之间跨越变成职业拳击手

translation.en: and beat people who've spent their whole life doin' it.
translation.zh: 打败那些一辈子都在这个领域奋战的人

translation.en: We're professionals. Boxin' is what we do.
translation.zh: 我们是职业选手 拳击是我们的营生

translation.en: And believe me, there's no way in this entire world
translation.zh: 相信我 我儿子绝对不可能

translation.en: my son would disgrace our great champion, Tyson Fury.
translation.zh: 让我们伟大的冠军泰森·富里蒙羞

translation.en: [Abdallah] Ladies and gentlemen, the WBC Champion of the World, Tyson Fury.
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 世界拳击协会世界锦标赛 泰森·富里

translation.en: [man chanting] Tyson! Tyson!
translation.zh: 泰森！

translation.en: [Tommy] Tyson put this family on the map.
translation.zh: 泰森让他的家族受到了关注

translation.en: In terms of boxing, we're here, and Jake Paul's here.
translation.zh: 在拳击上 我们在这里而杰克·保罗在这里

translation.en: He's a YouTube boxer.
translation.zh: 他是个油管拳击手

translation.en: This guy don't got no legs. He's top-heavy as shit.
translation.zh: 他的腿根本没有力量上半身超级重

translation.en: He look like the Michelin Man or somethin'.
translation.zh: 你看起来像米其林轮胎那个人

translation.en: And he's gonna get into the deep waters and drowned, and I promise that.
translation.zh: 他绝对会陷入深水溺亡的 我可以保证这一点

translation.en: Jake Paul has got a way of getting under people's skin.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗很会激怒别人

translation.en: He gets personal. He starts bringing family into the equation,
translation.zh: 他会上升到个人恩怨 他会把家人卷入这个等式中

translation.en: and he can be a naughty boy.
translation.zh: 他有时候真的很淘气

translation.en: He keeps on saying it's an easy fight.
translation.zh: 他一直说这场对战很容易

translation.en: You know, knocking me out.
translation.zh: 把我打倒

translation.en: He comes from the bloodline. Been doing it his whole life.
translation.zh: 他有拳击家族的血统他一辈子都在练拳击

translation.en: I just wanna know, Tommy, do you think this is gonna be an easy fight?
translation.zh: 我想知道 汤米你觉得这会是一场容易的对战吗？

translation.en: [Tommy] Look me in the eyes.
translation.zh: 看着我的眼睛

translation.en: You're getting put to sleep inside four rounds.
translation.zh: 你在四个回合之内就会无法起身

translation.en: As time goes on, with people like Jake Paul,
translation.zh: 随着时间流逝像杰克·保罗这样的人

translation.en: with his personality, they start believing in their own egos.
translation.zh: 随着他变得有名气他开始相信了自己的自尊

translation.en: They got all these people telling them they can do this, they can do that.
translation.zh: 他身边的人都告诉他他能做到这样 他能做到那样

translation.en: I think we make a deal, then. If you win, I'll pay you double.
translation.zh: 那我们就说好了 如果你赢了 我给你双倍的钱

translation.en: But if I win, I take everything that I'm paying you.
translation.zh: 但如果我赢了就把给你的钱全拿回来

translation.en: He's trying to play the promoter. He's trying to play the businessman.
translation.zh: 他在扮演筹办人 他在扮演商人

translation.en: And the fighter.
translation.zh: 以及打手

translation.en: When you got a man in front of you who is just playing the fighter,
translation.zh: 如果你面前有人在扮演打手

translation.en: you're in for a dangerous game.
translation.zh: 那就会是一场非常危险的比赛

translation.en: [Jake] Deal or no deal? Since you're so confident.
translation.zh: 成不成交？ 既然你这么自信

translation.en: -Deal or no deal? -[man 1] Take it.
translation.zh: 成不成交？ -那你就拿走-回答问题

translation.en: -[man 2] Answer the question! -[Tommy] What you gonna do?
translation.zh: -那你就拿走-回答问题 -你要怎么做？-回答问题

translation.en: Answer the question!
translation.zh: -你要怎么做？-回答问题

translation.en: You've dealt. You've got a deal.
translation.zh: 不行 你们说好的付全款 不然没得商量

translation.en: All or nothing. All or nothing.
translation.zh: 不行 你们说好的付全款 不然没得商量 付全款 不然没得商量

translation.en: I have no problem taking the bet against him.
translation.zh: 我不介意接受赌注 赌他输

translation.en: When I get him on those ropes, I'll be looking to take his head off.
translation.zh: 等我把他打得筋疲力尽就把他直接打晕

translation.en: [John] To be honest, I'm pretty scared what's gonna happen to Jake.
translation.zh: 我跟你说实话我很害怕杰克会发生什么

translation.en: Jake could well end up in the hospital tomorrow night.
translation.zh: 杰克明天晚上很可能会进医院

translation.en: Ooh. This is nice.
translation.zh: 真不错

translation.en: [man] It's been a minute since we've caught up, so where are we right now, and what's going on?
translation.zh: 我们上次说话已经有段时间了我们现在怎么样？最近发生了什么？

translation.en: Well, you guys are in my bathroom, in Saudi Arabia.
translation.zh: 你们在沙特阿拉伯 我的浴室里

translation.en: In just a matter of hours, my brother's gonna be fighting Tommy Fury.
translation.zh: 再过几小时我弟弟就会对战汤米·富里

translation.en: I've never had this many people in the bathroom while I'm bathing.
translation.zh: 我泡澡的时候从来没有这么多人观看过

translation.en: [man] Your brother seems to have it frequently!
translation.zh: 你哥哥经常这样

translation.en: Bro, that dude has so many people around him.
translation.zh: 兄弟 那家伙身边有太多人了

translation.en: -[man 1] Yes! Nice. -[Jake] Hell yeah. Let's go.
translation.zh: 对 不错 很好

translation.en: -[man 2] What was it? -[Jake] Eighty-six.
translation.zh: -是多少？-86 这是…

translation.en: -[man 3] Hey! -[Logan] My brother's thin.
translation.zh: -喂！-我还有一个…

translation.en: -Just two more pounds. That's it. -[man 1] That's it, baby.
translation.zh: -所以再多两斤 就这样-就这样 宝贝

translation.en: [Logan] Should Jake lose,
translation.zh: 如果杰克输了

translation.en: I think he'll have a hard time being able to come back from that.
translation.zh: 我觉得他会很难从中恢复过来

translation.en: The dude has all his eggs in one basket, man!
translation.zh: 这家伙把所有赌注都押在了一个地方 天啊

translation.en: All his eggs are in one basket!
translation.zh: 所有赌注都押在了一个地方

translation.en: Weight's on point. We're on the way to the weigh-in right now.
translation.zh: 体重很完美 我们要去称重了

translation.en: Tune in live. It's our last time being face-to-face.
translation.zh: 收看直播 这是我们最后一次面对面

translation.en: [Logan] I try to convey losing is possible.
translation.zh: 我试着传达 输是有可能的

translation.en: Have you looked defeat in the face and acknowledged it?
translation.zh: 你有面对失败 承认的时候吗？

translation.en: That's a demon in itself.
translation.zh: 那真是一个恶魔

translation.en: If he gets exposed, do people keep buying into him?
translation.zh: 如果他暴露了大家会继续给他投钱吗？

translation.en: Shit, dog, I don't know. -Would he go back to Disney? -[music ends]
translation.zh: 靠 兄弟我不知道 他会回去迪士尼吗？

translation.en: -See if he can play Dirk again? -[music restarts]
translation.zh: 看看他还能不能再扮演德克？

translation.en: [John] Jake Paul, when we take this shit in the ring,
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗 你等着我们在擂台对决

translation.en: it's over for ya. Ya getting knocked out.
translation.zh: 你完蛋了 你一定会被打倒

translation.en: -You cannot win it! Argh! -[all cheering]
translation.zh: 你不可能赢的

translation.en: Damn, he just keeps winning. He just keeps proving himself right.
translation.zh: 靠 他一直赢 他一直证明自己是对的

translation.en: At what point do I just stop, you know, denying the greatness that is Jake Paul?
translation.zh: 我要到什么时候不再否认杰克·保罗是伟大的呢？

translation.en: -Did you hear that? -[man] What?
translation.zh: -你也听到了吗？-什么？

translation.en: -Cristiano. -Ronaldo's here.
translation.zh: -克里斯蒂亚诺-罗纳尔多

translation.en: [commentator] And there is Cristiano Ronaldo.
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂亚诺·罗纳尔多在那里

translation.en: He's the biggest superstar on the planet. Well, next to him.
translation.zh: 那是整个地球最伟大的超级巨星就在他旁边

translation.en: [woman] Where? Let's go see him.
translation.zh: 在哪里？我们过去看他

translation.en: [John] To be honest with ya,
translation.zh: 我跟你说实话

translation.en: I know we've had to play our part, Tommy's had to play his part,
translation.zh: 我知道我们必须完成自己这部分任务汤米必须完成他的任务

translation.en: but Jake and his brother…
translation.zh: 但杰克和他哥哥…

translation.en: I'm in awe of the guys. They're children.
translation.zh: 我很敬畏他们 他们是孩子

translation.en: I'm thinking, "Check out the business brains on these guys."
translation.zh: 我想看看这两个人的商业头脑

translation.en: [Jake] John Fury!
translation.zh: 约翰·富里！

translation.en: John, huge fan, bro. Huge fan. [chuckling]
translation.zh: 约翰 我是你的粉丝兄弟 我超级喜欢你

translation.en: [John] At the end of the day, who'd have thought it would've been this big?
translation.zh: 毕竟谁会想到 能闹到这么大呢？

translation.en: And they've made us part of it.
translation.zh: 他们让我们也参与进来了

translation.en: I had to hold back emotions.
translation.zh: 我必须控制住情绪

translation.en: I, Jake Joseph Paul,
translation.zh: 我 杰克·约瑟夫·保罗

translation.en: will knock out, defeat, and embarrass Tommy Fury
translation.zh: 将会打倒汤米·富里让他挫败 让他蒙羞

translation.en: live in Saudi Arabia.
translation.zh: 就在沙特阿拉伯这里直播

translation.en: [Logan] You know what the through line is here?
translation.zh: 你知道其中的共同点是什么吗？

translation.en: Me, Jake,
translation.zh: 我 杰克

translation.en: Greg Paul, John Fury,
translation.zh: 格雷格·保罗 约翰·富里

translation.en: Tommy Fury, and Tyson Fury.
translation.zh: 汤米·富里和泰森·富里

translation.en: We all got some screws loose, bro.
translation.zh: 我们都有一点疯狂 兄弟

translation.en: The Furys and the Pauls, now, are locked in together in folklore.
translation.zh: 富里一家和保罗一家如今在传言中被绑定到了一起

translation.en: It was divine intervention.
translation.zh: 那是神的旨意

translation.en: This thing was meant to happen.
translation.zh: 这件事是注定要发生的

translation.en: History's written.
translation.zh: 历史已经定好了

translation.en: If it's written Tommy should win, he'll win.
translation.zh: 如果注定汤米要赢 他就会赢

translation.en: If it's written that Jake Paul wins, Jake Paul wins.
translation.zh: 如果注定杰克·保罗要赢那么杰克·保罗就会赢

translation.en: It's destiny, and no one can stop destiny.
translation.zh: 这是命运 没有人可以阻止命运

translation.en: -Let's get this party started! -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: 我们让派对开始吧！ （保罗 对战 富里）

translation.en: -[bell clangs] -[electronic music playing]
translation.zh: （2023年2月26日杰克·保罗 对战 汤米·富里）

translation.en: Step up! Step up!
translation.zh: 加把劲！

translation.en: Step up! You got this!
translation.zh: 加把劲！对 这还差不多

translation.en: Get that jab! Get that jab!
translation.zh: 进行重击

translation.en: [commentator 1] Jake Paul using his jab.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗在进行重击

translation.en: As we near-- A right hand to the body by Paul. Back comes Tommy Fury.
translation.zh: 随着我们靠近… 保罗右手打到了身体 汤米·富里回来了

translation.en: [commentator 1] End of the first round. Action heating up.
translation.zh: 第一回合快结束的时候气氛非常热烈

translation.en: -[bell rings] -And round number two begins.
translation.zh: 然后第二回合开始了

translation.en: All Fury's, all of his knockouts, have come in two rounds or under.
translation.zh: 富里所有比赛中击败对方都是两个回合之内完成的

translation.en: Both men seem to be relaxed. A stiff jab by Tommy Fury.
translation.zh: 两个人似乎都很放松汤米·富里快速出拳打空

translation.en: Overhand right over the top, connecting, but Tommy Fury ate it well.
translation.zh: 右上方过肩出拳 击中但汤米·富里似乎吃得消

translation.en: Logan Paul, how do you feel he's doing so far in the fight?
translation.zh: 洛根·保罗 他目前在比赛中的表现你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: He's doing great. He definitely got that last round.
translation.zh: 他表现很好肯定能进入最后一个回合了

translation.en: Tommy, if you can hear me, you a bitch, bro, and you gassing out.
translation.zh: 汤米 如果你能听到我说话你太弱了 你都累了

translation.en: You a bitch! The whole Fury family, a bitch!
translation.zh: 你太弱了 你们富里全家都太弱了

translation.en: I pissed him off. I pissed him off, Goddamn it.
translation.zh: 我激怒他了 靠

translation.en: [commentator 1] As Jake Paul went forward, he ate a couple right hands.
translation.zh: 随着杰克·保罗向前他受了几拳右手出击

translation.en: Stay in control!
translation.zh: 保持清醒

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, Jake! Bring it to him! Bring it to him, Jake!
translation.zh: 好 杰克！打他 打他 杰克！

translation.en: [commentator 1] That'll end the fifth round. Three more rounds to go.
translation.zh: 第五回合就这样结束了还剩下三个回合

translation.en: [commentator 1] Left hook! That sent… That wobbled Tommy Fury.
translation.zh: 左勾拳！这让…这一拳让汤米·富里摇晃了

translation.en: Fury might be hurt!
translation.zh: 富里可能受伤了

translation.en: [commentator 2] If you look at this fight, you have to ask, "Who is 'the YouTuber,'
translation.zh: 如果你看了这场对战 你会问 “哪个是‘油管网红’哪个是‘拳击手’？”

translation.en: and who is 'the boxer'?"
translation.zh: “哪个是‘油管网红’哪个是‘拳击手’？”

translation.en: 'Cause if you look at it,
translation.zh: 因为如果你去看

translation.en: Jake Paul is showing he is definitely a seasoned boxer.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗展示出他绝对是身经百战的拳击手

translation.en: [commentator 1] Close fight between these two,
translation.zh: 两人之间不相上下

translation.en: as Jake Paul continues to pursue Tommy Fury.
translation.zh: 随着杰克·保罗继续追击汤米·富里

translation.en: -A series of three right hands… -[bell rings] [commentator 1] …that found their marks.
translation.zh: 一系列三个右手出拳得分

translation.en: [Smith] Go get this motherfucker! Let's go!
translation.zh: 去打倒这个混蛋！来吧！

translation.en: He's trying to take everything. Let's go!
translation.zh: 他想夺走一切 我们走！

translation.en: [announcer] Final round!
translation.zh: 最后一个回合！

translation.en: [commentator 1] Eighth and final round between Jake Paul and Tommy Fury.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗和汤米·富里之间的第八回合 也是最后一个回合

translation.en: We have us a close fight.
translation.zh: 两人不相上下

translation.en: Who will prevail here in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia?
translation.zh: 谁会在这沙特阿拉伯王国称霸？

translation.en: [commentator 1] Oh my goodness! Got a knock-down. That could be significant.
translation.zh: 天啊！稍微倒下了这可能会很重要

translation.en: [commentator 1] If there was any doubt
translation.zh: 如果有人有疑问

translation.en: if Jake Paul would be able to hold his own,
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗是否有他说得那么厉害

translation.en: he has answered that with resounding fashion.
translation.zh: 他已经轰动地回答了这个问题

translation.en: [commentator 2] Absolutely.
translation.zh: 绝对的

translation.en: He just cannot afford to get touched at this point.
translation.zh: 他现在已经不能再被碰触了

translation.en: [commentator 1] But back comes Tommy Fury!
translation.zh: 但是汤米·富里回来了

translation.en: It is clear that Jake Paul and Tommy Fury were meant for each other!
translation.zh: 很显然 杰克·保罗和汤米·富里两个人注定不相上下

translation.en: Very impressive fight. Valiant effort by both guys.
translation.zh: 非常让人难忘的对战两个人都尽力了 非常英勇

translation.en: Nothing was left in the gym. They laid it all out right here.
translation.zh: 完全付出了全力 真的是不遗余力

translation.en: -[Greg] It's close though, man. -[Logan] If we're lucky, it's a draw.
translation.zh: 全在场上发挥了出来 不过很接近 兄弟 如果我们幸运 会是平手

translation.en: [announcer] The winner by split decision…
translation.zh: 评委们意见不一致 但获胜者是

translation.en: -[dramatically] …Tommy TNT Fury! -[crowd roaring]
translation.zh: 汤米·炸药·富里！

translation.en: [commentator 1] Tommy Fury hands Jake Paul the first defeat of his career!
translation.zh: 汤米·富里让杰克·保罗职业生涯首败

translation.en: You're not the man I thought you was. You're tough. You'll go a long way.
translation.zh: 你不是我以为的那样 你很强你会走得很远

translation.en: You started three years ago, I started when I was six.
translation.zh: 你三年前开始的 我六岁就开始了

translation.en: I've nothing but love and respect for you.
translation.zh: 我对你现在只有爱和尊敬

translation.en: It was a great build-up. Great fight. Thank you.
translation.zh: 非常棒的身体非常棒的比赛 非常感谢

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -[somber music playing]
translation.zh: （鞠躬）

translation.en: [man] Want some ice on that eye, baby?
translation.zh: 那只眼睛要点冰吗 宝贝？

translation.en: Yeah, I just didn't fight good.
translation.zh: 要 我打得不够好

translation.en: I didn't, like, capitalize on my moments, but it's all good.
translation.zh: 我没有利用好我的时刻 但一切都好

translation.en: -Sorry about that. -[man] Don't be sorry.
translation.zh: -你不用道歉-你让我们来到了这里

translation.en: [Stepnick] Don't you apologize to us.
translation.zh: -很抱歉-不用抱歉

translation.en: [man] Yeah, don't fuckin-- Jake. Never apologize for getting in the ring.
translation.zh: -对 不用…-你带我们来到了这里 杰克 永远不要因为在擂台上输了而道歉

translation.en: -[Jake] Can we cut that? -[cameraman] I wasn't rolling.
translation.zh: 这段可以剪掉吗？ 我没有开摄影机

translation.en: I don't want that footage on YouTube. This is just for doc shit with Netflix.
translation.zh: 我不想让那段视频出现在油管上 这是给Netflix纪录片的

translation.en: [man muffled] Fuck that. Look how far you came in this shit, man.
translation.zh: 去他的 看看你走了多远 兄弟

translation.en: Look how far you came.
translation.zh: 看看你走了多远

translation.en: No, Jake. Jake! Look how far you came!
translation.zh: 杰克 你走了多远

translation.en: [Tyson] Jake Paul, he's not a villain.
translation.zh: 杰克·保罗 他不是坏人

translation.en: He's an antihero. He's not a villain.
translation.zh: 他反抗英雄 不是坏人

translation.en: He does hero shit, but he just don't go by heroes' laws, you know?
translation.zh: 他做的事情很英雄但是不遵守英雄的规则 知道吧？

translation.en: -[man] Do you relate to that? -Yeah! Yeah.
translation.zh: -你同意这个说法吗？-是

translation.en: [Tyson] Listen… he did more for boxing than some of the champions did.
translation.zh: 听着 他对拳击做的事情比一些冠军做得都多

translation.en: I'm a fan of people that know how to put asses in seats.
translation.zh: 我就喜欢那些知道怎么让观众上座的人

translation.en: Those are the guys I look up to.
translation.zh: 这些是我佩服的人

translation.en: [Tyson] I like to see him talking shit.
translation.zh: 我喜欢看他说别人坏话

translation.en: The blond-haired, blue-eyed cute kid is getting mean.
translation.zh: 金色头发 蓝眼睛可爱的孩子变得很刻薄

translation.en: "Fuck you. You can't fight. You piece of shit."
translation.zh: “搞死你 你不会格斗 你个垃圾”

translation.en: "You're nothing. You're the…" [sighs gruffly] That's beautiful.
translation.zh: “你什么都不是 你就是…” 太美了

translation.en: -[Tyson] That sells papers. -[poignant music playing]
translation.zh: 这会让报纸大卖

translation.en: You're entertaining us. You're the champ. You're my hero.
translation.zh: 你在娱乐我们 你是冠军 你是我的英雄

translation.en: So we gotta keep this guy bright
translation.zh: 所以我们要让这个人继续火

translation.en: 'cause he's gonna save boxing as long as he continues to fight.
translation.zh: 因为他会拯救拳击只要他持续对战

translation.en: He-- He got the light. You know what I mean?
translation.zh: 他有那种光芒 懂我的意思吗？

translation.en: He's touched. He got the light.
translation.zh: 他是上帝给的天赋 他有那种光芒

translation.en: [Logan sighs] This is fucked up.
translation.zh: 这太操蛋了

translation.en: I don't know how Jake operates a-- as an emotional being.
translation.zh: 我不知道杰克作为那么情绪化的人是怎么运转的

translation.en: I don't know what's happening, and it's really hard for me to comprehend.
translation.zh: 我不知道发生了什么我真的很难理解

translation.en: I think he's not as universally likeable.
translation.zh: 我觉得他并不是被所有人都喜欢的类型

translation.en: He's much easier to hate than he is to love.
translation.zh: 大家对他讨厌比喜欢更容易

translation.en: He's a problem child.
translation.zh: 他是个问题儿童

translation.en: He is the Problem Child.
translation.zh: 他是问题儿童

translation.en: He's been a problem child his whole life.
translation.zh: 他一辈子始终都是问题儿童

translation.en: [man] All right, it's rolling.
translation.zh: 好了 开始拍了

translation.en: -[Logan] All right. -[man] Let's go, baby.
translation.zh: -好-我们走 宝贝

translation.en: -[Love] Let's work! -Let's go, baby!
translation.zh: -去工作！-我们走 宝贝！

translation.en: Netflix Untold! I'm back, baby!
translation.zh: Netflix《体坛秘史》！我回来了 宝贝！

translation.en: The comeback starts now.
translation.zh: 现在是复出明星了

translation.en: We got a new team, new mindset, new training schedule. And guess what?
translation.zh: 我们有了全新的团队 全新的态度全新的训练日程 -知道吗？-我们走！

translation.en: -[Smith] Let's go! -I'm knocking this motherfucker out!
translation.zh: -知道吗？-我们走！ 我要把这个混蛋干倒！

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 我们走！
